Reviews.Content: When you are away from home, it's always amazing to see what's going on inside your home real-time.  That's what the Dropcam allows you to do.  It's easy to set up and very reliable.  I would caution to make sure your wireless system has the capacity to handle the Dropcam.  Otherwise, plug and play.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Tracer
Reviews.Content: Best camera ever and it sound as well....but you must pay to store your data so it is an ongoing expense to use for security.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy from this company!
Reviews.Author: Ramen Girl
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Dropcam about 9 months ago and I have had problems with it on and off.  Recently, it decided it was shot.  The yellow light was solid and Dropcam tech support notified me I could return it under the 1 year warranty.  After several days and unanswered emails pertaining to the shipping date for the replacement camera I called again.  It seems my request was "misplaced".  But, I was promised same day, next day shipping.  Happily, the camera did arrive the next day and I set it up.  Initially there were problems with the camera dropping the Wi-Fi, but, after 2 days of nightly viewing it seems to be okay now.  Overall, I am just satisfied with the camera and service.  If you need help, do NOT use the Dropcam email!! It's as slow as molasses.  I don't know how long this camera will last, but it will be my last.  I don't like the features, the reliability, the constant dropping of the Wi-Fi (and I have excellent equipment), the cost for monthly recording (which should be a given), and the amount of data usage.  Consider another brand.  There are cameras out there for half the money that have excellent ratings and free features.*********update********So, the replacement camera was up and running for about a week, but now there is an http error on Dropcam's end for 3 days this week, and I can NOT view my camera from work via the internet.  They said their engineers are "working" on it.  How is this a SECURITY camera if it hardly ever works?!?!?  Either the camera itself is having problems, or the Dropcam servers!  I don't have the option of using my tablet as work, as they have blocked the ports needed to view it over the Wi-Fi.  So, I am s*** out of luck!  If my house gets robbed or there is a fire, will Dropcam take responsibility?  NOT!  Time to get a different security camera.  Now I'm out the 150.00 for the DROPcam and whatever I need to spend on a new camera.  Thanks DROPcam!

Reviews.Title: so easy to setup and works very well
Reviews.Author: littleme
Reviews.Content: I have tried cams from other manufacturers. this drop cam is expensive but its easy to setup and works really well. totally satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Great Peace of Mind
Reviews.Author: V. Sieff
Reviews.Content: Great product, easy to set up,took me about 10 minutes.Very good picture quality during the day and at night. I use it while I am away and it looks great on my iPhone.I would highly recommend the Dropcam.

Reviews.Title: Great home monitor!
Reviews.Author: Katrina J. Foster
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to have set up in my apartment to have on hand when my child comes home from school, or when I'm out of town.  I really like it so far!  Once you set up your Dropcam account, it will send email notifications for when there is movement in the house, or if the camera is turned off, which I assume can be from Wi-Fi interruptions.  I gave it 4 stars because I'm not able to see a feature that allows volume adjustment directly on the camera, if you want to speak through it.  I tested it out with my son to see if he would be able to hear me, and he could, if he were directly in the room.  I'm not sure if it's loud enough if he steps out of his room and down the hall.  Dropcam has an app to be downloaded to a cell phone, and it's very nice!  Picture quality is great! And... it even shows a great view when the lights are out!  So, if you want to check in, and there is a little night light on in the room, you still get a great image.  I plan to purchase at least two more to have set up in othe areas of the apartment.  I believe Dropcam allows up to 5 cameras, so that's very convenient!

Reviews.Title: just tested this cam out
Reviews.Author: Aubray Chase
Reviews.Content: We found this camera work good but not as good as the Dropcam Pro. The pictures is good but the view is not the sound is ok on this camera you get what you pay for the camera price for the cameras The Dropcame Pro and Dropcam price is set right but the video monitoring price is over price to me.

Reviews.Title: So easy to use
Reviews.Author: Travel Pam
Reviews.Content: This is so easy to use, great customer service too. It literally takes 3 minutes to set up and you don't need to be a techie to do it.The picture is good, you can watch from your iphone too.

Reviews.Title: Picture is great. Sound is bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "danu25"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to watch my cat while I am on vacation.  She was recently diagnosed with Kidney disease.  The picture is great and the motion detector works really well.  However, the 2 way audio stinks.  It only worked 1 way. The only time it worked both ways was when you were in the room with the camera.  It did the job of where I could check on her, but I would have liked the audio so I could have talked to her pet sitter.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Works great as advertised. When zooming at full zoom it's a bit unclear other than that great! Would buy more for other areas in house.

Reviews.Title: Overall we are very pleased with our Dropcams...
Reviews.Author: W. Sampson
Reviews.Content: We have five Dropcams and they work quite well.  We decided to run them on standard definition (vs. high def) just to save on bandwidth.  The quality of the video is still very good.  I would recommend these cameras as a good way to keep tabs on things at home when you are away.  The cell phone app makes viewing things a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Northern Michigan
Reviews.Author: Robert Raymond
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying these cameras. My kids are all over the country and they can keep an eye on me and check out the weather up here in Northern Michigan.

Reviews.Title: nice little movable cam
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Zegadlo "BookMonster"
Reviews.Content: has good resolution & sound and you can talk through your phone app while watching to the room where the camera is in! i mess with my kids and cats lol... easily movable (as long as you have a power outlet with several feet (cord is actually pretty long). it connects to your wifi in seconds and pumps out your video to a secure centralized www site. you go there (dropcam.com) and meet your stream. the benefits of this are you need no infrastructure in your house to deal with this... ergo recorders or other hw. also you can share your stream with friends, family etc. out of the box it will only allow you to watch real time (theres a few seconds delay due to standard internet latency) anytime you want but for 10$ a month you can have 30 days worth recorded on their DVRs to go back and watch it when you like. lastly, the andriod app and ipad apps both work well and allow me to turn off the camera when im at home so i dont keep getting notifications (it will notify you via txt/email when the built in motion sensor detects movement and include a picture in the communication of what set it off!).

Reviews.Title: Best thing on the web
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: I found it to be as easy to install as the ad said, love the thing, highly recommend it to anyone who has a use for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy, Fast, really cool
Reviews.Author: Madelyn Mette
Reviews.Content: Easiest thing I have EVER installed - took about a minute's time.  This thing is awesome so far.  I set it up and shared it with a few people right away.  Very impressed with the options for changing camera settings.  There is a lag of about 2-3 seconds in the recording, which is fine.

Reviews.Title: Expensive
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: They really don't tell you that you cannot set it up to record to your own HDD. Must use their cloud service for a monthly fee or no recording at all. Otherwise the camera takes very good video.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: A. Arvizo
Reviews.Content: This little DropCam is plug and play. I have been very impressed with it. Once it's configured for your network, there's nothing else to worry about. The Android app works great and the desktop browser interface is intuitive as well. It makes for a great security camera when combined with their recording service for $99 per year for 7 days of archive. I hope they make an outdoor version soon.

Reviews.Title: We love it for monitoring the pets
Reviews.Author: A. Urbistondo "ITProOnTheGo"
Reviews.Content: We have several for monitoring the pets. Of course we see other things, but the main purpose was to monitor the pets when we were not at home. It gives us piece of mind to know that all is well since one is in kidney failure and the other just likes to get in trouble. I would rather monitor them with these cameras than confine them.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Clara
Reviews.Content: I enjoy getting sound and motion alerts. no messy wires (WiFi), only power plug to deal with. I recommend this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: It works just as I thought it would
Reviews.Author: James Zwick
Reviews.Content: It works just like I expected.  It captures the view perfectly better than I thought  That's all I can say.

Reviews.Title: I love it....
Reviews.Author: Kevin Schoenfelder
Reviews.Content: This was so easy to set up and super easy to view on my phone & thru my computer...Would highly recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: denise missick
Reviews.Content: Love the clarity of the camera both day and night. The convenience of checking camera anytime on phone or pc, & it was easily installed. It give also sends notices on phone if activity is going on when we are out of town.

Reviews.Title: NO CVR OUTSIDE USA
Reviews.Author: paula morales contreras
Reviews.Content: Very dissapointed. Outside USA you can't purshase CVR to record with the camera. If you are outside USA you only can use it for live streaming. For me is useless. I need a camera that can record because I work and I want to be sure that my kid is in good hands. But I can't see camera all day!! I need record to review a footage... For me a lost my money. It so easy to sell outside worldwide!! why not? Bad service for a technological company.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam is the best !!!
Reviews.Author: Emma Dirzius
Reviews.Content: This camera was easy to hookup no issues at all. The camera works great the audio and video is superb.

Reviews.Title: Great camera... totally recommend it.
Reviews.Author: Sergio Ortega
Reviews.Content: The set up literally took 60 seconds and the image is clear and sound is also very clear. The motion detection works well and the night vision is also clear. Great product. Only suggestion is to have the app available for Windows phone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, excellent cloud service, terrible wifi reception
Reviews.Author: Allen Chen
Reviews.Content: The Dropcam was easy to set up, and the video and sound quality are quite good. The web and mobile apps are nice (I tried both the iOS and Android versions). There is good parity across the different clients, though some features and settings are only accessible through the web app. From a usability perspective, it pretty much operates exactly as you would want a cloud-enable video camera to work. One feature I wish they would add is the ability to adjust the threshold at which motion events are triggered. I have my camera pointed outside and things like swaying trees cause notifications to be sent, often spamming my phone.The Dropcam has one huge weakness that may prevent it from being a viable solution for many people: it has abysmal wifi connectivity. I had an incredibly difficult time keeping the camera connected to the Internet, and after doing some research, it seems like many others have the same issue. I tried two different routers (Apple Airport Extreme and a D-Link) and observed the same issues. It also seems very prone to interference. Using wireless devices close by seems to cause the problems to worsen. On occasion, it even seems to prevent other devices from connecting to the internet.Switching to SD video quality from HD and turning off the microphone seems to help. In the end, I resorted to relocating my router to within 15 ft of the camera. Unfortunately, not everyone will have this option, and if you are trying to have a multi-camera setup, I really don't know what you could do other than throwing wifi repeaters everywhere.

Reviews.Title: This camera is great!
Reviews.Author: Lynn Brockway
Reviews.Content: I use this camera to watch my cat when I'm not home. I love it! The setup really is so easy and the night vision works great too.

Reviews.Title: Works exactly as advertised, love the web interface
Reviews.Author: D. C Smith
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Finally a camera with a user-interface that doesn't suck or require a computer to be left on 24/7.  Of course you have to pay if you want the DVR-style storage system, but I love being able to make clips, use the iPad app from anywhere, look back in time very easily, and put this camera in anybody else's house if they want.  We used it to help catch a rat that was making a mess of my mother-in-law's patio, she didn't know what was going on until we "saw" it.  I just wish they had a fully weatherproof outdoors model and maybe an upgraded model with pan and zoom eventually would be very nice, but I understand the tradeoffs of having a simple device.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Matt D
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera. I got it to replace my cheap Chinese-made camera that was a headache to set up. Man, what a difference! This thing can be set up in just a few minutes and works great. I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Very easy to set up and use
Reviews.Author: Ryan Park
Reviews.Content: There are probably cheaper camera systems with more features, but it's hard to imagine anything being easier to set up.  As long as you have wi-fi, and somewhere suitable to mount the cameras, they work very well, both in the dark and lighted conditions.  The app works well and overall the system is easy to work with.  I would have liked more resolution and some pan and tilt capability, but I knew that the latter was not an option when I bought it. Overall, i am satisfied.  These will be great doggie cams.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: anju
Reviews.Content: I bought this to check on the baby while at work, the audio is good and the image is great. I previously had a dlink camera, from which you couldn't hear anything and the image was not as good quality as this one. The only oops with this, is that if you are living outside USA or canada you won't be able to purchase the cloud option, unless u get someone from US to buy it for you.

Reviews.Title: Setup easy as 1, 2, 3!
Reviews.Author: J. McKenzie "Soccer Mom of 3"
Reviews.Content: We are loving our DropCam!  Setup was a breeze and we had it up and running very quickly.  Love the microphone feature and our teenagers were quite surprised the first time we "talked" through the camera!  There is about a 3-second delay in the video feed, but still a wonderful item.  Picture quality is very good both day and night.  I love that I get a message on my phone with there is movement or sound.  I've turned off the sound alert as I have two dogs...again, a great feature that I can CHOOSE what I want it to alert me about.  My husband and I both put the app on our phones so we can turn cameras on or off when away from the house.Loving this product so far!

Reviews.Title: Ordered It New, It Came Used
Reviews.Author: Mel McRee
Reviews.Content: The camera works great unless you don't have great bandwidth.  We use it to keep an eye on the baby in the crib but if you're watching a movie on netflix the lack of bandwidth causes the camera to lose its image.  As for ordering a new camera and getting a used one……….that's just bad business.  It worked fine but there were some scratches to the camera face, luckily not on the lens itself.  Had to call Dropcam to have the camera reset because the previous owner hadn't reset it but once they did that the camera worked fine.  I'll buy directly from Dropcam next time.

Reviews.Title: Worked Great
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: Picture and sound quality was great, small and easy to hide.  This is exactly what I was looking for to keep an eye on things when I wasn't home

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use!
Reviews.Author: P. Ferraro "Mom of 3"
Reviews.Content: I can barely send email and I had this up and running in no time. I purchased this to see what my dogs are up to while I am at work.  I was able to see how long I am gone before mischief sets in and which dog is the prime candidate for the crate if I will be away for more than 3 hours.  Works well in low light. I am considering setting it up in a window to see which neighbor doesn't clean up after their dog when walking past my house or what critter is living under the shed now. Could be helpful to see if your teenager really was home by midnight.

Reviews.Title: Decided against it
Reviews.Author: Joyce T. Vela "Just Me"
Reviews.Content: Best thing going for it is that the setup is a breeze.There was a considerable time lag on our internet, so part of the experience will depend on your internet speed.The real deal-breaker for me was the monthly service fee to have any recording capabilities whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Great Wireless Video Camera!
Reviews.Author: fed l.
Reviews.Content: It's good to know that you can leave the house with a piece of mind by using Dropcam. Knowing that you can login anywhere at anytime and get an alert via motion sensor, is awesome! If you have internet access, your camera will work just fine. Also, the price is right!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Chris M
Reviews.Content: Overall this is the best $150 I have spent in a long time! The picture is clear, the audio is clear, super simple to set up!The one drawback that I have noticed is the wifi, it kills my internet connection when the camera is on. I have a DSL 20meg and with the dropcam on my connection goes from 20meg download speeds to 6megs. For whatever reason the dropcam consumes huge amounts of my internet connection.Other wise its a awesome little camera if anyone is looking to drop in on their home or work!

Reviews.Title: Good quality camera, but expensive
Reviews.Author: Omar Alladina
Reviews.Content: Purchased from Target:You can view your home via "live" stream (delayed a few seconds depending on ISP) and the set-up is a breeze. It's Apple-like in its design, ease-of-use and price. And it's the price of the camera and the recurring cost of saving your videos via Dropcam's servers that are the deal breakers for me. For the same quality of picture, you can get two competitors' cameras for the price of one of these. If you add in the Pro recording costs (30 days of feed), you could supply your home with a security system.I like the product, but there less expensive, equally capable wi-fi cameras out there.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam HD Wi-Fi Wireless Camera is - Peace of Mind.
Reviews.Author: Ronnie D.
Reviews.Content: The Dropcam HD Wi-Fi Wireless Video Monitoring Camera is one of the best security devices I have purchased.It took less than 15 minutes to set-up, just hook it up to your computer via the supplied USB cable and follow the easy directions. Make sure that your router has a strong password, and then give the camera access and bingo - you're done.Unplug the camera from the computer and attach the electrical adapter to the USB cable and plug it in, and you'll be live in a short time.I mounted the camera about 7 feet from the floor in an inconspicuous location, and pointed so that it would cover the largest areas. I also purchased the 7 day recording plan, so if the sad day arrived when I really needed the video for some reason, I would be able to retrieve it. I also connected the camera to a very small UPS back-up in case the power was lost.I can monitor our home 24/7 from my smart phone or laptop, and another great feature is being able to save specific clips from the recorded video. I also receive motion and sound alerts via email so I know exactly what is going on, and the time it occurred.You can also purchase multiple cameras and strategically place them around your home or business to cover the main entry points, just insure that when setting them up, that you name them all differently. This will enable you to login to each camera individually. (Check with your ISP to insure that you won't exceed the allotted bandwidth during the month.)Note: I just noticed that they now offer the Pro version, it offers a little wider field of view, but I believe you will be very pleased with either one you purchase.I think the Dropcam HD Wi-Fi Wireless Camera is a great security investment!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: ML
Reviews.Content: I tried ordering some other cameras and they were a hassle to hook up. These were totally easy. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Andrew Ireland
Reviews.Content: So far I am extremely pleased with my dropcam. I would not recommend it for something like home security. It doesn't provide the clearest images. What I do love is that you can communicate through the camera, your computer mic can record messages which dropcam will play. There is day/night mode. Yes, you do have to pay if you want to store clips on the cloud. The interface is awesome and the set-up was really easy. Its extremely useful for things like determining which pet is responsible for the messes when you aren't home, seeing which kid started the fight, making sure your spouse is being faithful, etc. This is low tech, but effective. Its a good start to security/monitoring issues

Reviews.Title: Dropcam
Reviews.Author: WSEI Sale
Reviews.Content: Amazing product. Just what I expected.  You can monitor night and day activities 24/7.  You can even interact with person in the room by turning your microphone on. Very easy set up process.  tons of features. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely wonderful!
Reviews.Author: DeepInFL
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd purchase of this camera and this one was on the Cyber days, so it was a FABULOUS price!  Yes, I could have purchased the new model, but at the price I was so happy.  This is absolutely so easy to set up, in fact the hardest part was drilling holes in the wall for the screws!  The quality is great, love the TWO way sound and being able to use the iPhone app is amazing.  I leave the program up on my computer at work all day and that way I can check on my elderly Mother and the dogs.  I just can't say enough good things about this.  I have had MANY monitoring cameras, but this one was 1. the easiest to set up, 2. the best quality and love the TWO way sound and 3. the most reliable.  Only sad part is that they REALLY REALLY need an outdoor model and when they do I will buy 2 or 3 more.

Reviews.Title: Doggie Cam
Reviews.Author: Ekim Lavodnas "Queeb"
Reviews.Content: Easy setup with my Apple MacBook Pro. The Quality of the video is great for the $$$$. We use it to talk to our pets when we are not home.

Reviews.Title: Great for small area.
Reviews.Author: LaVonda F.
Reviews.Content: This is placed in a small office area.  Performs better than the one I previously owned and spent lots of money on.  Great nightly view and the now yoh can expand screen with your fingers.  Awesome.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Toby Chapman
Reviews.Content: Works just as advertised. No problems with the setup or use. I do wish the stored video was encrypted since I trust the "cloud" about as far as I could throw it.

Reviews.Title: can't recommend it yet
Reviews.Author: carumba
Reviews.Content: Great device when it works.  Had it for a couple weeks now.  Camera randomly drops the connection though which is ibecoming very annoying - our devices will say the camera is not connected, and then all of a sudden the camera connects without us changing anything.  Seems to be harder for iOS devices to get the feed than our android phone.  My hope is dropcam is identifying bugs and fixing them otherwise if this keeps up we'll want to return the device.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: K E Thomas
Reviews.Content: It is nice product and seem to be solidly constructed. My only issue was that whenever I seemed to put them up high in a room that was a room away from our wi/fi router it would loose the wifi signal. Not sure why that is, as I lowered them it would keep the signal. Clear picture and easy to connect.

Reviews.Title: Works as described
Reviews.Author: Andy Alt
Reviews.Content: This camera works as described-- within a few minutes, my sister and her husband had a camera + live mobile feed setup in their newborn's room. I believe they have a new version with some additional bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Very good interface and recording options
Reviews.Author: JJ2145
Reviews.Content: This is a really good camera.  Recording features and interface are top notch.  Recommended to anyone looking for a quality camera with good interface

Reviews.Title: Exellent!
Reviews.Author: Victor George "victor1651"
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I've purchased to date as a sentry for my house and pet watcher, definition is very good.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup, well made with a nice App, and The 7 day loop storage is well worth $10 a month
Reviews.Author: Valerie Poole
Reviews.Content: We love this product! Easy to setup and well made... We bought it intending to use it as a live feed, but after to using the free 14 day trial of the 7 day loop, we couldn't pass up the service since it only cost $10 a month... A small price to pay to be able to catch a thief!  Drop cam app is nice too... We went on vacation recently, and I couldn't remember if I had locked the door, so we logged onto the app on our phone and zoomed in to confirm I had locked the door which allowed us to vacation worry free without having to call someone to lock up behind me.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with the Dropcam HD!
Reviews.Author: John J. Rinck
Reviews.Content: I own two of these, and they've been working great for over six months now.  One monitors the outside continuously, and one monitors the inside when no one is home.  Setup is quick and easy, and the portability is a super-plus.  The alert system really makes this shine, and I like the cloud storage.  Sure, it eats up bandwidth, but if I ever need the footage, I trust it's safe.  The unit does tend to get a bit hot, so be careful where you put it.  Try to make sure it gets ventilation.  There may be better resolution cameras out there, but this one is good, and it's easy to use and move around, so it gets my vote.

Reviews.Title: Simple to set up
Reviews.Author: KK
Reviews.Content: The camera is simple to set up and the iPhone app works very well.  The only reason I don't give this 5 stars is due to the frequency of disconnections this camera has.  I can't explain why it disconnects.  My home network is fine and my other wireless devices connect to the Internet without a problem.The 2 week trial of the recorded history was a good idea.  I am more inclined to pay for the service now that I know what they provide.

Reviews.Title: Ehh
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: It's a pretty reliable product.  I was not however happy that it constantly has to stream video to the cloud.  This I didn't like.  While creating great reliability and connectivity, it eats up bandwidth.

Reviews.Title: Quality device, not so quality app
Reviews.Author: Andrew Teets
Reviews.Content: only gets 4 stars because the app has an issue with losing its connection to the camera, forcing a restart of the app. does not happen often, but enough to be annoying. if you use it regularly like my family does to watch our new baby, you will probably run into the issue a few times a week. can be a real drag at night when it loses its connection after you fall asleep, and you wake up to realize it may have been a few hours since it was actually giving you any sound or audio. if that ever gets fixed, it will be 5 stars. excellent picture quality and SO EASY. i still highly recommend this for anyone looking for a baby camera or just a way to monitor their home while they are in or out.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera .I like the audio /mic capabilities. Easy hookup to wifi..Easy viewing with night vision.I plan on getting another

Reviews.Title: HD Cam is awesome!  Very Easy to setup and use!
Reviews.Author: Doug E. Doug
Reviews.Content: Love it, so easy to set up compared to a few other brands I bought.  Found it very cool that it can send you push notifications to your iPhone if there is movement or sound, depending on what settings you select on the camera.  You can also talk to the camera as well I believe, saying something to someone in that room as you are viewing the camera on your phone.They have a service that you pay for after a trial to record movement and video, however I am curious if you can just record it to your computer as an option as well.  I would look into that first before buying, but its HD video is very cool from this little solid camera!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful investment
Reviews.Author: David L. Wade
Reviews.Content: This a great thing to have to watch over things and give you a peace of mind. I am a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: Must Have a US visa card otherwise no subscribtion
Reviews.Author: bGawdat
Reviews.Content: Nothing to say more about the camera. The reason am giving them 2 stars because of their customer service.After I subscribed for 3 months and paid monthly for it. All of a sudden they reject my card As it is not a USA visa card.There is a lot of ways that can be offered for payment but they refused.Plus the customer service guy was not helpful at all. he was just like a robot that only says what knows.

Reviews.Title: Works well!
Reviews.Author: David R. Renegar
Reviews.Content: Great unit for the price! It hooked up really easily and I was able to line it up in short order.

Reviews.Title: not for me
Reviews.Author: Janice L. Owenby
Reviews.Content: Had to return....tech at Dropcam could not get camera to work well with my setup.  Love the idea and the product, though.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind..
Reviews.Author: Kyleniite
Reviews.Content: These cameras are fantastic.  Setup Is incredibly easy.  Had it up in running in a few minutes.** My security story.....  I had this camera setup in my bedroom because I had several high priced items stored there.  One day when I was at my girlfriends house I got a notification on my phone from my camera (To be honest, depending on where you set your camera you can get false alarms.. so I wasn't too concerned).  But when I checked the video,  I saw an individual rummaging trough my room.  At this point,  I was a 40 minute drive from my house.  I called my local police and they were there within minutes.  Unfortunately, the kid was gone before they arrived.  But because of the video,  they were able to get fingerprints (video showed items he picked up and then put down) and they had decent views of his face and general appearance.I don't know if they ever found this individual but,  if they catch him at another crime,  they will have no trouble charging him for this break in as well.Grat price for the peace of mind this can bring.

Reviews.Title: Sharp Looking - Easy to Use - Exceeded My Expectations
Reviews.Author: Rae Aaron
Reviews.Content: I love this little gizmo.  It was extraordinarily easy to set up.  It is small, elegant, and simple to operate.  The software on my iPad is great and the software for my Android phone isn't quite as slick, but still good. I loved being able to see what was going on at the house while away on vacation.  I also like knowing what is going on day to day.  The video quality is quite good.  The night vision does not have the same definition, but considering it is only using the small built in IR lamp for the night video, the image is surprisingly good. Audio is also surprisingly good.  The two way audio is kind of clunky because it only works one direction at a time and there is significant delay, I have had good luck using it to speak to and sooth my upset pet from afar, since the conversation was only one sided.  Trying to remotely have a two way conversation to my house sitter was frustrating, and we quickly decided a phone call was a better way to communicate.As for the subscription service, my DropCam came with a free 2 week trial of their recorded service.  It sold me to buy the 7 day recording package.I work in IT and it's not often that I am wowed by ease of use and design in new products, but this has really impressed me.  I have heartily recommended this to many friends and family ... even those who aren't especially technically inclined.  Everyone I have demoed it for on my iPad are very surprised at how well it works.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!
Reviews.Author: John Fitzgerald "formula first racing"
Reviews.Content: It Is a great little camera, very easy to install. Good quality picture. Represents a great value for the money!

Reviews.Title: Love these cameras
Reviews.Author: Tara Gildea
Reviews.Content: great camera. I bought 3 and I use them all the time. works great with ipad and my iPhone. The audio is not too clear, but the video is good.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam rocks!
Reviews.Author: Laura Wonnacott "Laura W"
Reviews.Content: Superb camera!  Simple and easy to use app from smart phone or tablet.  Really love the notifications, too!  These are useful when motion or activity is detected and you know nothing should be moving in the viewing area!

Reviews.Title: Great video at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Great peace of mind video for any application. We use for second and primary homes along with professionally installed security system.  Great picture quality in daylight and night.

Reviews.Title: Best, product, ever!
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: This is easily the coolest product and piece of technology I own. The app world perfectly and I love the whole thing.

Reviews.Title: Good picture!!!! Like it a lot work really good with the iPhone
Reviews.Author: Efren L Rosa
Reviews.Content: Good picture and quality....I wish if will come smaller Good picture!!!! Like it a lot work really good with the iPhone

Reviews.Title: Just buy it you'll love it
Reviews.Author: Jd
Reviews.Content: Greatest camera out there if your considering a survaliance camera this is the one to get  Just bought my first dropcam pro last week. Set up took less then 1 minit, quality is simply amazing. I will definitely buying more thanks dropcam for a great great product!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Brian Terry
Reviews.Content: Camera helped me catch someone trying to rob my house. Police posted the video I captured on the news and caught the guy!

Reviews.Title: I RARELY GIVE A PRODUCT 5 STARS, BUT...I'M BUYING ANOTHER ONE...IT'S EVEN BETTER THAN I HOPED IT WOULD BE!
Reviews.Author: Phil Pearce
Reviews.Content: Phil's review of the Dropcam Wireless Monitoring Camera ($150.00 version)This is a Prime item, so it arrived 2 days after I ordered it, no shipping charges.  What a great program Prime is.In the box were the camera and mounting frame, USB cord, and adapter (similar to iPad power adapter).  Honestly, I plugged one end of the USB cord into the camera, the other end into my computer's USB port, and it automatically found my router.  It asked for the ID number of the router (which is printed on my router), it verified it, and I was up and running.  That took all of about 3 minutes.  It did NOT ask me for 801.3 numbers, or WPA, WEP, WAC, or any other scary settings.  Plugged it into the computer, it found my Wi-Fi automatically, asked for the ID number that's printed on my router, and I was set.I took the camera to where we had decided to set it up, and plugged it into a wall outlet.  The 10' cord was long enough, but I think that if an outlet was farther away, you could probably just use a household extension cord.I had turned my computer OFF, so I wasn't sure if it would work like that, but I thought I'd give it a try anyway.  I turned on my iPad, downloaded the free app, and accessed it.  There was a button to turn the camera ON.  Immediately, I had a beautiful live color picture of our living room.  This easy setup convinced me that all the other features of the camera would work as advertised, and they did.  You can "rewind" the video 5 minutes, and with the CVR function (an optional added monthly or yearly subscription, but they give you a free 2 week trial) you can view any activity from either 7 days or 30 days prior.PROS*******EASY setupExcellent picture qualityOutstanding very low light (or no light) picture (infrared LED system)Two way sound!Simple, intuitive controlsRemote access via computer, tablet, or phone (Android or Apple)!  A fantastic feature.Can be set (EASILY...really) to alert you via email whenever there is motion detected, and allows you to "filter out" alerts for known moving objects such as pets.  It learns to recognize your pet's size, color, speed, etc. so that you can set it, if you wish, to NOT send alerts for certain things.You can make and save clips, and share with others.  EASYExcellent Customer Service (I called them just to see how good their CS was)One of those products that turn out to be FUN to useProduct performance and features exceeded my expectationsCONS*******The circular camera (about the size of a hockey puck) snaps into the metal frame.  When I opened the box for the first time, the camera had "snapped out" of the frame and fell out.  No damage, but they should print a warning to that effect on the box.  That's about the only negative I can come up with.SUMMARY***********I would (and have) recommend this to friends and family.  We used it to monitor our dog while we were on vacation.  But it can be used as a security device (it is for indoor use only, but you can sit it on a window sill pointing outward and monitor your yard, driveway, etc....remotely!)  We were on vacation 1500 miles from home, but whenever we wanted to, we d just pull up the app on our phone, and boom, the live picture popped right up.  Now that we're back from vacation, we've set it up to monitor our back yard, so that whenever we're out, we can turn on the camera remotely, and it will alert us to motion.  We're getting another one for the front yard too.  The nice thing is that you can move the camera to different locations, and no additional setup is required.There are other monitoring cameras on the market, but none compare with the ease of setup of the Dropcam.  No need to enter IP addresses, security codes, etc.In a word, this product's design, operation, and performance is ELEGANT.

Reviews.Title: Makes me want to buy another.
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: Text alerts, low level light viewing and 100% dependable. Hopefully the next HD cam will surpass this one. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy w Camera and Service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "ET"
Reviews.Content: Overall quite pleased and I give this 4.5 stars. I pay the $10/mth to have any footage retained in the cloud for 7 days. They only thing i wish for is an OUTDOOR version of this camera. If DC would market one of these, their sales would go through the roof! I would buy 3 immediately!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera and connects really easy
Reviews.Author: Z. Altman "Iwhatt"
Reviews.Content: Had it for a year. Works well so far. It looses connection sometime but almost always gets it back within few minutes. It does get warm so some air circulation around it a must. Good products.

Reviews.Title: Cool camera
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I have had absolutely no problems. I use Comcast 20mbps and its fine. My wireless router is a dual band. I mainly use it with my Samsung galaxy s4 to keep an eye on things. I'm thinking of getting another one. I will update my post if I do as to how two cameras eat up bandwidth.Setup was easy and flawless. I realistically had the camera setup and working in about 20 minutes (no hurry ) , app for phone setup was flawless too.  I had my doubts because of some negative comments but I didn't experience any myself. I have some hard wired cams and quality is about equal to what I'm used to seeing.  It's a little pricy I suppose, but depends on what your personal definition of pricy is.Good concept. Wish they made an outdoor version, but looking a window works fine in the day. Night vision doesn't work well through glass because of the or glare off the glass or screen.Cons: Camera gets hot and the plastic mount is absolute cr@p. mount needs a totally new design to hold weight of camera when mounted on a wall.Had to make my own mount.  Still give it 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Works for me!
Reviews.Author: mcgoes
Reviews.Content: Our home was being egged at least twice a month.  I bought this camera and although it is not outside it does capture any motion or activity outside the window it is facing.  I have it in an angle where the window does not reflect the light from outside.  I am ready for the next culprit who tries to egg our home.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup but not happy about the additional cost of recording or night vision
Reviews.Author: Meowcat
Reviews.Content: We have an IP camera in our business to keep an eye on things when we're not there.  It has never worked right for recording, but it can take stills and save them to a network drive, which is usually fine.  Would prefer if it could record video like it was supposed to.Long story short, I decided to go a different route when I wanted a camera for home and wanted to try this product.It is easy to setup (if you can get Wifi working - I could not initially) and uses a standard USB cable for power, which makes it easy.To view the camera, I just go to the dropcam.com website and login and the camera is there.  I can configure it remotely through the dropcam website.Now my biggest complaint involves the fact that recording requires an additional monthly or annual fee.  The recording is great because I can look "back in time" to see what happened - if UPS came or if someone was at the door, etc.  But paying extra for this feature seems kind of silly when you're already shelling out $150 for the unit.The unit should be, like, $30, and then I would not complain about the fee.  Or offer a lifetime subscription for the unit when you purchase it.  I don't see us keeping this, honestly, because of the fee.My second biggest complaint is that it does not work through windows at night.  The night vision light reflects off of the window and you can't see diddly.  This is completely useless at night if you are looking through a window.

Reviews.Title: Overall pleased
Reviews.Author: Douglas T. Holt "10ecdoug"
Reviews.Content: The camera works as advertised. Sometimes the location services has little glitches. Occasionally error messages saying the alerts failed to turn on when I leave. The mic is very sensitive setting off alerts when the camera itself switches from day to night vision. It's a little spendy but overall I'm pleased and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great for babies (and more)!
Reviews.Author: Tony L.
Reviews.Content: Our Dropcam was one of the most useful purchases for our one-year old child. We have ours on the dresser of his nursery, and for a room that's about 8'x10', we get a clear shot of his crib, as well as about 60% of the rest of the room. Dropcam works great both during day and night, the night vision is particularly useful since we can monitor our baby without having to turn on the lights. Using Dropcam made sleep training our son tremendously easier, and has given us a peace of mind we never expected. At night, we'll even leave one of our cell phones on just to have the live feed running, the mic is sensitive enough to pick up the slightest whimper.Dropcam comes with the camera, an adjustable stand, a USB cable and an AC adapter. While Dropcam markets setup in under 60 seconds, it did take several tries to get the WiFi up and running, so be prepared for a little frustration. Once on your WiFi network, it's portability shines--you simply unplug the camera, move it to any room you want, plug it in, and it just works. With the camera in one hand, and a smartphone running the app in the other, it's easy to set up a satisfactory shot.The DVR functionality is great--we've subscribed to the 7-day feed. The DVR feature is accessible through a web browser or mobile app, and consists of a slider with markers for when it detects motion (web), or a list of activities for when it detects motion (mobile app). Either method provides a slick interface with a simple learning curve. And while we're not exactly thrilled about paying a monthly fee, it's handy to see when our baby wakes, and when we go in to check up on him. This feature makes it a great device for other features. You can set it up in your living room to watch your home while you're away, set it up to watch your pets, or to keep an eye on your driveway.A couple of minor gripes, there is a slight lag from anywhere to 2-5 seconds from when action takes place and when you see it on your PC or mobile app. And, of course, there's the somewhat steep price and afore mentioned monthly fee. But for a slick device that's easy to use once it's up and running and provides an elegant solution to peace of mind, Dropcam is an incredible purchase that I whole-heartedly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Marjorie
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Easy install. Very surprised how easy it was and the quality is amazing. I would buy again for sure!

Reviews.Title: Very easy to Set up!
Reviews.Author: Kat Nap "Kat"
Reviews.Content: Great Camera, VERY EASY TO INSTALL!, Clear indoor video, Must get cloud to view video, it's about $100 per year.

Reviews.Title: Great Product

Reviews.Content: I can understand why it is #1 selling product in this category. It has great image quality and solid motion detection alert. I am impressed by the company and product.

Reviews.Content: Loved the câmera,but i have one problem she do not care.I'm in Brazil now! like to know how to do that back not working?

Reviews.Title: Perfect!

Reviews.Content: Well designed product that was installed and ready to use in a matter of minutes. I wish they made one for outdoor applications.

Reviews.Title: works well and the price is right.

Reviews.Content: works well and the price is right.the only problem I have is that my cell phone chimes from time to time and I think the noise originates from a signal from the drop cams. However, this is just a guess as I am not sure where the sound originated

Reviews.Title: I can sleep at night
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: We have been looking for a video unit for our child's room so we can keep an eye on him. We looked at a few baby monitors but I didn't like the video quality. The Dropcam was our last ditch effort and we couldn't be happier. Setup took five minutes and the video quality is great. As a bonus the cam is easy to move from one room to another making it our new "nanny" cam. It also pulls duty as our security cam for the times we are gone for the weekend.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: R. Weeden
Reviews.Content: The silver holder makes obvious, however I colored it with a sharpie to black and blends in really well now. You do have to pay after 10 days. I don't remember reading that on the web. Works really well.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer

I am planning on purchasing another camera to place in another area of my home, that's how satisfied I am with this product .

Reviews.Title: Dropcam
Reviews.Author: Snarkey "Snarkey"
Reviews.Content: Very easy setup. Only needs computer for initial setup then just plug it in anywhere within range of your wireless.  Works great.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!

Reviews.Content: I would recommend these cameras to anyone that wants a no hassle set up surveillance camera. It took less time to set up and see the images from my cameras to my smartphone than it does to walk across the street to check my mail.I tried another brand that my brother had bought and got bogged down by needing to put in ISP's etc.These units really are as easy as plugging them in..Now I can keep an eye on my house that I have for sale 3 hours away with no worries.

Reviews.Title: This is the ONLY camera I recommend to people.
Reviews.Author: Holli
Reviews.Content: I work in animal rescue and needed a way to monitor our fosters when we were away. I needed something that would be easy to set up, work effortlessly and that I could see video on my phone with 3G service that didn't require using the phone's browser. I did a lot of research and this is the ONLY camera that fit all the criteria. It took less than a minute to set up on my windows laptop. When I move it from room to room, it reconnects to my internet in less than 20 seconds. When I leave it plugged in in one location, it hasn't had any problems for days at a time.This is THE product that I recommend to anyone that is looking for a camera to monitor, or check-in when they are away from home. I only wish the camera was a little bit cheaper as I had wanted to get a few as raffle items to donate for some animal rescue fundraisers. It really is a product that people love when they see it in action. I can't saw enough great things about it.

Reviews.Title: Easy Install and Great Hi Res picture

Reviews.Content: I installed this after buying and running the netgear vuezone and the difference is like night and day.although the view zone has it's advantages (cable free cameras) the picture on this dropcam is way better. The bonus is it also has audio.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: marci
Reviews.Content: my dropcam is working beautifully for the month i have had it. ver easy to install, easy to use. problem free so far.

Reviews.Title: Works great as a baby camera.

Reviews.Content: Bought this to use as a baby camera for our newborn 6 months ago.For the most part we have been very happy with the unit itself with only some minor complaints.Pros:- Works decent enough over 3G, my wife can check on baby anytime she wants for peace of mind even when she isn't home.- Very small.- Easy to setupCons:- Unit gets pretty warm.- Night vision can get confused in low lighting and keeps switching modes.- I think the price could be a bit less.My intention was to use this as a baby camera and then repurpose it as a security camera for my garage. Reviews.Content: Super easy and quick setup. Good video quality, despite not so crispy. Effective night vision. Great IOS app. Perfect to monitor a room or other indoor situation.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and great quality
Reviews.Author: Daniel Herrera
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera 6 months ago. No problems so far. It took me 5 minutes to install. I can see it from my Ipad. I cannot see images from my Blackberry. From work the website is block due to security. This does not have to do with the product. I fully recommend this product.

The camera was broken and needed to be replaced.  Dropcam replaced it without any major hassle.  Also, I don't feel comfortable that it's "un hackable", they security features are not up to my standard.  I used the cam for a month and haven't turned it on in a long time.  I wish i didn't buy it.

Reviews.Title: Really love this

Reviews.Content: Love this. I put this up in a frontroom window to watch my front yard and porch area. Once the neighbor kids knew (I posted the warning on front door window) they don't mess with things in my yard. Am going to buy another one in the very near future for the back of my house. Was easy to install on the computer and have had no problems with it so far.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera with recent excellent update
Reviews.Author: Lisa A. Norton
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these in September to keep an eye on the daily activity of my Mother's home.One camera is inside and one outside. With the wide angle I get a very good overview.Set up was incredibly simple and the signal range works very well in the home.I subscribe to the Cloud Video Recording and can access the view from my iPhone, Kindle Fire and any computer. For less than $150 a year I feel much more in touch with the daily routine many miles away.Today, Dropcam rolled out an upgrade so that I am able to zoom and enhance the camera view. Also, the activity log is now color coded and I can label recurring events. In my opinion it's a great improvement.I am very pleased with Dropcam, the CVR service and the recent update. I highly recommend Dropcam!

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup, easy to use
Reviews.Author: N7SF
Reviews.Content: This worked just as it was explained.  you plug it in, it configures on its own,  then you place the camera.  its that simple.  works great on my android phone to keep an eye on my house and pets.  so simple to use.  I love the ability to record data in the cloud, then I can go back and check events like motion.  I'd recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great baby monitor for us!!
Reviews.Author: vks
Reviews.Content: We are loving this camera!! We use it as a baby monitor.  The set up was a cinch and the only problems we have had with it are based on our own internet connection.  The video quality is awesome, day and night view.  The sound is excellent, almost too sensitive but that's not a complaint.  We love that the iPhone app is free and our families can watch him anytime they want too.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: matthew
Reviews.Content: Easy setup. Great picture works just like advertised.  Multiple networks and easy to use apps for apple products thank you

Reviews.Title: Dropcam
Reviews.Author: Alex A.
Reviews.Content: Got the dropcam in the mail today. It was having trouble finding my wireless router during the setup. I called the customer service number and the young lady that answered was so nice and helpful. Had it up and running in a few minutes. Great product and great service. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: tbirdmike
Reviews.Content: This camera  is great....you can see what the camera sees anytime anywhere from your smartphone or laptop.  Day  or night,,,,

Reviews.Title: Easy to install!
Reviews.Author: Dixie Thomson
Reviews.Content: Great product that's easy to use. Only downside is you have to pay a regular fee if you want to save the recordings.

Reviews.Title: Get the drop on the bad guys
Reviews.Author: M. Powell
Reviews.Content: The bomb, easy to set up, easy to share on the internet. Had it set up in 4 minutes. The mounting was easy with the supplied hardware.

Reviews.Title: Love this invention! Great for home security and for spying on your pets!
Reviews.Author: Gen
Reviews.Content: Great investment to spy on my pet when I travel! Loooooove it! Dropcam customer service is great too!! Love the option of no status lights on the item itself..

Reviews.Title: My Doggie Cam
Reviews.Author: Paula C.
Reviews.Content: REally impressed with how easy it was to initiate.  Had some issues with buffering, but not sure that was a Dropcam issue, but their customer service department responded quickly and no issues since.  I have recommended this to several friends and once I see an exterior camera on their website, I will order one of those.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: user friend n modern
Reviews.Author: AH
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect product for me. There is no need to have another equipment to store images. Thus, less space is required, actually no space is required. Just set it up and that's it. It wonderful to view online at any location at any time. However, ppl should know that you cannot use an international card to purchase the cloud space.

Reviews.Title: WoW. Amazing HD camera!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up - works very well with Apple App. Great picture quality. But beware - the camera ALWAYS uploads to the Web to Dropcam - so make sure you either set this camera to SD quality, or get an internet plan with sufficient data! Has good night vision capabilities. (SD is fine for an iPhone for example.) Microphone talk has lag and is an "emergency" type solution only - also is not full duplex so only one way communication at a time.The camera does what it was designed to very well. Apple App has nice features and works well also.  This camera just works right out of the box with minimal setup (need to create Dropcam account first but then it is smooth sailing).  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: I love my dropcam
Reviews.Author: Santos Macias
Reviews.Content: I had mine for over 3 months now, and I haven't had a problem. I am getting ready to buy one more so I can have a greater coverage of the house, I definitely recommend the product. I just need to see the life expectancy of it, I hope is more than two years, that would be acceptable.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: SvVeranda
Reviews.Content: Wow. What a great product .does all it says easy to use and setup don't hesitate to buy this . Deserves ten stars.

Reviews.Title: Great cam I use it every day
Reviews.Author: David Luehr
Reviews.Content: This cam is just what I was looking for. Great video and audio, wifi works great, I just love it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: T. Lindabury
Reviews.Content: Super simple to set up and easy to use! DropCam has a great monitoring service as well if needed. Would recommend this to anyone who needs a cam.

Reviews.Title: Have to buy monthly plan to use dvr features
Reviews.Author: fRiEdfiSh "Gills"
Reviews.Content: No problems setting the camera up.Has a really nice wide angle lens on it which makes for an amazingly wide viewing area.  The image quality is marginally better than my EasyN and the sound quality of the mic sounds perfect for this sort of an application.I originally bought the camera to use with my Blue Iris surveillance software but quickly realized this wasn't going to be an option since the Dropcam video feed is proprietary and they requires you to set up an account with them and that you purchase a plan that allows 7 day recording for $9.95/month or $99/year or 30 day recording for $29.95/month or $299/year.  That actually doesn't sound like a bad deal if you factor cloud storage for 30 days of video into it.  Still I'd have been happier if I could have used the feed in Blue Iris for my needs.  If you haven't tried Blue Iris for your surveillance camera needs I would highly recommend it.  It's so robust and has so many features for so many cameras and the price is really affordable.  They are constantly updating it fixing bugs and adding new cameras.  Unfortunately Dropcam has stated that they will not be making their signal open.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Donna C.
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It's 100x's more dependable than my "other" camera. Has nightvision too. They are working  on an outdoor version. Wish I knew of this one last year! Works on WiFi and 3G. I will most likely buy more!!! A must have!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Justice for Trayvon
Reviews.Content: I love this product. I no longer have to worry about things when I'm away from home. I can just open the app on my ipad to be assured things are fine at home. Setup took less than 60 seconds and a fifth grader could set it up- it's that basic and simple to do. The only con is that the viewing area is not as large as I expected, and you cannot pan out in order to view a larger area. I would say you need a few of these to view a whole room- I tired placing the dropcam in a few places, but still could not get a view of the whole room. Overall I am pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: TERIFFIC!
Reviews.Author: Alana Canupp
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing for the price. It's actually a steal. This literally took 3 minutes to set up on my Mac. it's so easy, even my mom could do it. It works well in low-light too!. If you are thinking of getting a home camera, and have Wi-Fi, I HIGHLY recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Needs work on refreshing after moving. Also a sensitivity adjustment. Would send a motion alert even with my labs yawning or ears twitching thru a window and 75 to 80 feet away. Would buy another one..

Reviews.Title: Fast, simple, Low profile, good picture
Reviews.Author: G-Man
Reviews.Content: I had previously purchased the wansview cameras.  The wansview did not work for me because it requires port forwarding on the router.  My router does not support it.I just got this Dropcam and after about 3 minutes of setup I now monitor my animals from my computer and my iPhone.  Simple, low profile and good picture.  I have audio if I want and night vision at will.  If I ever need recording I can purchase server space from Dropcam but since I only need live feed right now it is FREE.I like it so much I am buying another one right now.If it fails I will update the review, but for now it's 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Grandma Cam
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Purchased two units to cover my mother-in-law's house next door so we can monitor her. (Alzheimer ) We also purchased 4 iPads so 4 families can help with the monitoring. This is keeping her out of a nursing home.  Unit works well, easy setup. Only problem is the unit goes offline some but not enough to be a problem, just aggravating.  Manufacture says .5 meg upload bandwidth per camera and we have a total of .86 meg bandwidth so we have less than recommended. Night vision not so good so we keep lights on to get a good picture at night. Again, that is a bandwidth problem I believe.

Reviews.Title: Works OUT OF THE BOX!!  Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: reywalwen "reywalwen"
Reviews.Content: This is terrific.  I can't find a single thing to complain about yet but if I do, I'll change my review.  It shipped quickly, I set it up in 5 minutes and it worked perfectly as advertised.  I got another one immediately!

Reviews.Title: Terrific System
Reviews.Author: Yardman
Reviews.Content: Terrific system.  Super easy to set up and operate.  Pictures are clear and motion detector excellent.  I have not had occasion to use night vision camera and can not report on that feature.  Only drawback I have found is that I had to increase my data plan with ISP as recording events in the cloud eats up a lot of gigs.

Reviews.Title: It's nice but...
Reviews.Author: D. Cormack
Reviews.Content: I think it's a nice camera. I used this to keep an eye on my home while on a vacation (recording the their DVR site). As others have stated, you get a LOT of false motion detection alerts, presumably due to shifts in lighting. I left the lights on so there was a fairly consistent environment but I'd still get random alerts throughout the day. I think they really need to resolve this issue or at least have a way to adjust the sensitivity (this would all be on the back end). Also, I really dislike the fact that I HAVE to have this camera connect to the web to view the camera output. If I had the option to access it locally only and to turn off the web stream, I'd love this device. I don't want / need the camera output streaming all the time while on. I'd love to be abel to put it into a local stream mode only so that I could place it in my child's room to check in now and then from my iPhone or computer.If the company could make these updates, it would be an awesome camera for home use!

Reviews.Title: We have two
Reviews.Author: zaxwrit
Reviews.Content: Love our Dropcams! I've had cams since the year 2000, they were so expensive and such a pain to set up with the special software and extra bandwidth. Not these! For the same price as the pain-in-the-tush cams, this Dropcam is plug and play. The only thing we cannot do is point it out a window at night because the night vision lights reflect on the window. But that's ok, we have other uses for them. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for a working mom
Reviews.Author: YARELI VARGAS
Reviews.Content: I use to be worried all the time while I was working because I had to left my 1 year old baby with the nanny. Surprisly the first time I use de dropcam (she never noticed it) I realized how much care she gave to my baby. Now I am relax and I can give my 100% at work.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!!!
Reviews.Author: E Abernathy
Reviews.Content: We spent a good amount of time researching cameras available for home and small office use. We kept coming back to the Dropcam unit for several reasons. First and foremost is the ease of setup. This camera is literally 'plug n play'. Once the registration process is complete...which doesn't take long at all, you detach it from the computer, plug it in an electrical outlet, turn  it on and wham! You are up and running! The picture clarity is most excellent, and the view is plenty wide to capture most of the area anyone would be interested in getting video of. We were also impressed by the clarity in the sound abilities of the Dropcam, and was pleased to see there was an adjustment in mic sensitivity. What we  didn't see much of,  in the many other write-ups, were comments concerning the notifications available to either android or iphone's. We were very interested in the Dropcams alerting us to activity in the area we were monitoring, and found that the system is very responsive in alerting to any sound and/or video...within seconds... if you have a clear signal to your phone! THIS WAS VERY IMPORTANT to us! The audio portion does have to be tweaked to get it to just the right sensitivity, so as not to alert every time someone just walks near the door!This system is WELL WORTH the rather small investment for the camera. In addition, the affordable fee for being able to access video for a period of 7 to 30 days, is also well worth the fee!We highly recommend Dropcam!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Ming Fu
Reviews.Content: With the expectation that the video and voice quality will not be good after reading some of the bad comments, it actually turned out to be pretty good and it satisfied my family's need to monitor when children are coming back home or who is entering our home etc.  I like the two way audio feature.  There is a a few seconds lag, but that is normal considering the signal has to travel through all the internet highway and firewall etc.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam HD Wi-Fi
Reviews.Author: Kat Harvey
Reviews.Content: Clear picture but consider the additional cost to get maximum usage out of the Dropcam.  The yearly cost would make this camera worthwhile.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Effective
Reviews.Author: Shashonna Smith
Reviews.Content: I really liked how easy the setup was.  I was using my camera within 5 minutes of unpacking it.  Plus, the price is just right for my needs and budget.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Jutta S. Kobel
Reviews.Content: Works great and we love it! A must have! Easy to install and easy to use! Love being able to see our dogs when we out!

Reviews.Title: Easy to install.
Reviews.Author: gmoney
Reviews.Content: Easy to install , work great, like to buy another one. Work great on my I phone. Can view my shop from anywhere. If you are looking for a wireless camera for home or work this is the one to get. P.S. you can hear and talk with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: H. Nayar
Reviews.Content: Good design, easy to set up, quick to connect and easy configuration. Video quality is good. There have been a few bugs...but customer support is good and very responsive.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and easy set up!
Reviews.Author: JoeP
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to set up, less than a couple minutes and I use it all the time to see my son on business trips or while at work!

Reviews.Title: Good if you can get wifi to work
Reviews.Author: K S
Reviews.Content: This is ok. We cannot use HD because it takes forever to load. It is also sensitive to wifi location. Areas that our iPads work over wifi, the camera will stop working. Once we found the right spot, it works seamlessly.

Reviews.Title: Best Monitoring System Around
Reviews.Author: Dr. Robert L. Kemper
Reviews.Content: We really love this surveillance camera. Now we know what time deliveries are made, who brings them, etc. it's really quite an amazing device.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: This Dropcam is a great and affordable security camera.  It was easy to set up.  I had it up and running in a mater of minutes. I am planning on getting another one.  It also has a great feature if you choose, you can share your camera with other users. Some are set up at different places around the country, like a zoo or cafe.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to set up, and functions very well.  I enjoy mine.  Thanks DropCam for making the camera.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Security Camera
Reviews.Author: obihan
Reviews.Content: I liked this camera so much that I purchase a second and am thinking about adding more.  It was a bit involved to set up at first but once it is synced it works very well.  The picture is incredibly sharp.  I like that I can monitor it from my computer, my iPhone and my iPad from anywhere, even without the "i" devices connected to WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Great device and easy setup
Reviews.Author: Andrew "coach_johnson"
Reviews.Content: Great device and easy setup! The auto detect notifications and two way communication is fantastic!  I am getting a few more for other rooms.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Alison Carter
Reviews.Content: I use it to watch my chickens while at work....bought two!  Works great!  Can check on them when I'm away too!

Reviews.Title: I bought another
Reviews.Author: Spylab
Reviews.Content: I am really impressed with this camera.  I had tried another that was in the $90 range and had to return it due to poor reception. I have been very hesitant to try another. Set up really is super simple. I accidentally found myself on their old activation site and it asks for an activation code which is no longer required.  I just signed off and back on, got to the correct place and the camera communicates its unique number automatically.  You just need to enter a name for your camera and your wi-fi password and that is it.  Unplug from your computer and plug into a regular outlet with the supplied USB adapter.  The 10ft cord was plenty for my application. I have mine looking through double pane windows in the front of my house and get a very good picture.  I get motion alerts from activity in the street.  I want these alerts, I am at the end of the street so have very little traffic.  I am really impressed with the sound quality in the room where the camera is installed.  The sound on the monitoring end is good but does have a little bit of a back ground noise with it.  I talked to my dog when I was close to home and it made him go crazy looking for me.  There is a tiny delay in what you see and what is live but only a split second.  I have read other reviews to turn off the infared to see out windows at night but am not sure how to do that with this camera (seems to be a newer version than their original).  It will double as a baby monitor when my grandson is over, it is so simple to move around and aim, it is no trouble at all.  If the camera is unplugged, you simply plug it back in and it automatically reconnects to your wi-fi. The actual camera is the round black part and easily pops in and out of the grey holder if you want to place it in something different.  It does say to allow good ventilation, the camera can get hot.  It comes with a disk to mount the grey holder on the wall, again, it pops in and out easily from the wall mount holder so it does not have to be a permanent placement.  I plan to install the wall mount to keep it out of my grandson's reach when he is over and set it back in my window when using it for surveillance.  To view the camera on computer you simply sign onto the website and you can make the picture full screen.  I have downloaded the app for my iPhone and iPad mini and you just open the app and have your picture.  The iPad shows spaces for 4 cameras and you just touch on the one you want to make full screen.  The camera comes with a two week free recording period which you can activate without a credit card.  Monitoring is very reasonable at $9.99 a month if paid monthly for saving 7 days of recorded material.  There is also an option to save 30 days of recorded material.  The nice thing is no DVR is required, Dropcam stores everything in the cloud on their encrypted servers. Each additional camera is discounted at 50% for recording services but recording is not required and live viewing is always free.  It is very easy to navigate the recordings and view motion detected events. You can even scan through the recorded material because it shows a picture of what is recorded during the time you are mousing over. I have ordered a second camera to monitor my back yard and dog door area.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product
Reviews.Author: J. Aguiar
Reviews.Content: I am amazed at the quality both in video and audio of this device.  I've purchased several of these throughout the company and highly recommend it and the company!  And the support people that work at Dropcam are stellar as well!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use video monitoring system
Reviews.Author: emby
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with my choice to use Dropcam to monitor my front door and dog. It took less then a minute for me to set up! The seamless app integration makes it stand out from other competitors.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Kevin Kearney
Reviews.Content: I didn't get my cable/internet bill yet but so far so good!! Reliable and hardly noticable by visitors. Good buy for the money

Reviews.Title: Makes an excellent baby monitor.
Reviews.Author: Deepak Singh
Reviews.Content: I use Dropcam as a baby monitor right now, and it is just awesome for that.  The killer feature is the ability to control the camera via my phone or tablet.  The microphone is excellent, and the motion detection, while a little laggy, is pretty useful as well.  I suspect I'll be picking up more Dropcam's for other utilities over time.4 stars because of the occasional latency and buffering problems.  I also wish I had more zoom control.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam
Reviews.Author: Wedens
Reviews.Content: Dropcam is the best. Setup is quick and easy all you have to do is plug it into your PC in less then a minute you plug it in to an electrical outlet and are ready to start watching. I have two cameras. The support is fantastic I have never been put off by someone too busy or not understanding to my question. Never had a problem that did not end up being an ISP problem.

Reviews.Title: Really walks the talk
Reviews.Author: Gul  H  Thadani
Reviews.Content: The Dropcam HD works better than I expected. Why?  1. It was up and running within minutes of opening the box.  2.  The resulting image is crisp.cool and clear with no glare or fuzziness.  3.  Has withstood the test of time ...very stable operation.  4.  Excellent customerservice was just a phone call away (you get a human voice not a machine)  5.  Imagine no buttons to setup ... there arent any ...very easy quick start.  6.  Very compatible with mobile devices.Suggestions for improvement: If the Dropcam name could be on the side instead of front, it would be less conspicious for security reasons.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam is "almost perfect" for baby/pet monitoring
Reviews.Author: Owen W
Reviews.Content: In the next generation of Dropcam, I would LOVE to have a thermometer function that tells you the room temperature.  This probably won't happen because Dropcam is marketed as a security camera product, not a baby/pet monitor.  Imagine how much additional market share they can capture if they add this one little feature.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up and easy to view
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: This was a great addition to our home. Keeps a watch on things while we are away. Easy to set up and view. I did not opt for doing the DVR thing. Just want to see the area live.I watch my dogs when at work. Also are thinking of adding another camera to view another part of our home for the security aspect. Do wish they made a waterproof one for outside  and perhaps drop the price a bit so you could use as a whole home security system. . All in all a really good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: excellent home video camera
Reviews.Author: xenoc
Reviews.Content: The Dropcam HD wireless is excellent in every respect.  The device is solid and appears well made, the connection to my wireless network (through a Mac) worked flawlessly, the video image is clear, setting up a cloud based account for saving video was also simple and the iphone App for monitoring video and controlling is also simple and worked seamlessly so far.  I dont have enough experience with this to confirm that the motion and other alerts work well nor how stable this will all be over time.  There is also a very thoughtful function in the app that controls the on/off function of the camera based on your GPS location determined by the iphone (ie the camera is off when you are at home and turns on when you leave the house).  The only drawback Ive encountered so far is that the audio aspect of the device is virtually unusuable but not sure how important this is.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Kevin Burgess
Reviews.Content: This camera is awsome. especially when your away on vacation, which allows you to keep an eye on your home.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: David T. Kolojay
Reviews.Content: Super easy to set up and get going live. Used Apple apps to view with ease.  Clear picture and awesome night vision. I'm ordering another ASAP

Reviews.Title: Petcam
Reviews.Author: smw
Reviews.Content: We have had the Dropcam set up for a little over a week now and love it!  We love having the ability to keep an eye on our pet when we leave the house and, although I have not used it that much yet, the ability to talk through the app on my phone and have it come out of the camera in my house is really cool. To us anyways! Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Bernard Lee
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to install. The video is very clear (sharp). I highly recommend it to anyone. It works as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Works well, easy to use
Reviews.Author: sldonnelly80
Reviews.Content: I loved how easy it was to set up the Dropcam and start using it. It took just mere minutes to start seeing the streaming video on my various devices. The talk feature is great and the picture quality is good, even at night. They give you a free week of DVR to see how you like viewing "past events".
