We loved it right away.The only downside to the use of this service is the packages offered for the DVR feature. I purchased this for keeping an additional eye on my dogs while we travel. We have people checking on them, but this gives me the ability to see their activities and give me peace of mind while away for work or pleasure. So I'm not using the recording feature all of the time, just for short segments of days during a week. The recording feature is only available for 7 consecutive or 30 consecutive days. Even if you only need it for 4 of those days, you pay for 7, and they don't roll over to future dates.I'm hoping that more customizable DVR features will be available. In the meantime I'll be very selective for which trips I use the DVR feature.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam HD
Reviews.Author: Dan Baker
Reviews.Content: I received my Dropcam last week.  Set up time was under 5 minutes.  App interface for iPhone and iPad is fantastic.  Was not sure about the virtual DVR function but the free trial that came with the camera has convinced me to sign up.  Will be adding more camera's soon!

Reviews.Title: Great view
Reviews.Author: blk182atn7
Reviews.Content: I bought this to watch the babies room.  Some issues it that you have to have a computer or mobile device on 24/7 to hear or see the baby.  It lost connection to my network to many times.  I have several of these in a datacenter that work great.  So I moved it to my office and no problem.The video is great,  you get a wide angle view so its perfect for a large room.  still worth the money.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: Joansie
Reviews.Content: So easy to set up and very reliable.  I can keep track of my house from my iPhone.Pictures are clear.

Reviews.Title: Great cam
Reviews.Author: Robert R. Hansen "ISU Bob"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this to provide security that I could view when away from home. Camera was easy to setup and install and it works just as advertised. thinking about getting a second one for another area.

Reviews.Title: well done Drop Cam
Reviews.Author: Smaz
Reviews.Content: I have an older Dad who is at a point in life of needing assistance. Myself and family had concerns about how he was being treated. I purchased two drop cams installation was as easy as advertised within 5 minutes I had first on line great picture and sound. I have other family members on account so Dad is never really alone we also purchased 7 day dvr so at anytime from any where events can be viewed. at this time we have a new Agency and peace of mind. elder abuse can happen to ANYONE.

Reviews.Title: Great way to watch our dogs while we are out!!!
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I am professional dog trainer and for years folks have said the would love to see what the dog is doing when they leave the room or the house.  Well this is the answer to all of those issues!! You can watch your dog AND talk to them through the camera!  Well done Dropcam!!!

Reviews.Title: This thing is awesome
Reviews.Author: quentin E cox
Reviews.Content: This is the greatest little product price is right it does everything it says it will the cameras clear small works with my iPhone perfectly I will be buying more.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam
Reviews.Author: Jerrell D. Hall "Jelly"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. Very easy to install great picture. You will not go wrong with this unit. I love it so much I am waiting to get the outdoor camera when it comes out and it will with a great company like DROPCAM.......Don't worry you will love it if you buy it>>>>>>>>>>>

Reviews.Title: Very good quality
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Osers
Reviews.Content: Is a very goo web cam. Pitty I can not configure this cam as an IP cam, i takes a lot of you band. It is allways sendind information and no just when movement or sound.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup, but very limited backups
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: This is a great product if you want a baby monitor that's quick and easy to setup. However, the product falls down when you try to backup your video files. You can only store 30 days worth of videos and it doesn't allow you to easily or automatically backup beyond that.What I really want is a service that takes every 30 days of videos and compresses them and let's you download them easily--or better yet automatically.I have a server running securityspy ($50 software) that let's me backup unlimited storage.... it's more complicated, but a better solution if you need to backup your video.if you just want to know who stole  your paper? dropcam is fine.

Reviews.Title: Finally.
Reviews.Author: Robert Ferran
Reviews.Content: A very inexpensive and safe way to keep an eye on the things that matter most. I have been looking for a long time for security cameras that are effective and consumer friendly to set up. Finally found the answer with Dropcam.Thank youRF

Reviews.Title: 4 Dropcams
Reviews.Author: Raul Pty
Reviews.Content: I have 3 operating drop cam units and one to be installed. The drop cams are working beyond expectations. The quality of the images is excellent and the night time pictures are very acceptable. I get a notification in my cel phone anytime that motion or sound is detected. I will suscribe to the one week event storage service soon.

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: TJC
Reviews.Content: 5 minutes and was up and running. Great picture quality. Gets a little hot but other than that it's good.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Parker "A. Parker"
Reviews.Content: The setup on this camera was super easy I was afraid I was doing something wrong.  The picture quality is great, even with night vision.The only down side is the delay- especially if you're getting this camera because you like the talk back option.

Reviews.Title: Works great as promised peace of mind for empty houses
Reviews.Author: Richard Jordan "Alpaca 133"
Reviews.Content: Easy set up very good picture quality well made solid piece of engineering. Nice mobile phone app as well can see my house anywhere in the world

Reviews.Title: Super!
Reviews.Author: Lil' Rod
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this monitoring camera, it works great, easy to set up, and worth the money! My husband is also very satisfied because now he can watch his dog from work!

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Massoud Vaziri "mvaziri"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as part of my home security. It literally took me 2-3 minutes to set it up. The iPhone/iPad app works fine, except it is very basic. But I can set it up to turn on during certain time of the day, while we are at work and turn off when home. I also have it set up to send me an email alert when a motion or sound is detected. It takes about 25seconds for me to get the alter.The camera itself is very small, it's the Stan that makes it look bigger. The wire that comes with it is heavy gage, and stiff, and white which makes it had to conceal. It's a bit expensive for its basic operation, but so easy to set up. I'm thinking about buying another one. I'm read that it uses lots of bandwidth,so if you plan to install more that 3, you may need higher bandwidth. My Internet connection speed is 20mbps.

Reviews.Title: great product, easy to set up
Reviews.Author: greg hyde
Reviews.Content: Bought two. One for inside and one facing driveway. Works great. Night vision does not work well inside window. Lots of glare. Overall very pleased.

Reviews.Title: love Drop Cams
Reviews.Author: Chris Wisnoski
Reviews.Content: Love our drop cams, bought 2. Great price, great device.these have received a lot of good reviews too, by others, not just me.Easy to setup, just connects via wifi and usb to power.

Reviews.Title: Love our camera!
Reviews.Author: Megan Hogan
Reviews.Content: The only issue is I wish you could zoom in, but considering the price, this is a very amazing camera. It's really nice being able to see my son during long days at work.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, easy set up
Reviews.Author: Margaret Kemeny
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. Quick set up, nice night vision a d motion detection. The talk back feature has been so so. We are going to buy another so wife can watch dog during the day.

Reviews.Title: Great baby cam!
Reviews.Author: Jules
Reviews.Content: This is our second cam we have purchased. We decided to use the dropcams as our baby monitor. We like that its very mobile, connects to the Internet wirelessly and is viewable at any pc or more importantly on our smartphones. The camera has a good picture, there is infrared for nighttime viewing and it's easy to put anywhere.  It's very portable. We brought it to the in-laws over the 4th and setup was a breeze. My only concern w the cam is the motion detector feature. When you have the camera on but are not watching it live, it notifies you when there is movement. I have noticed there are times when there was movement and I have not gotten the notification. We are monitoring it closer to make sure it is working as we expected. all in all a great product. All you need is an Internet connection and you are all set. My husband can log in when I let him know our daughter went down for the night or a nap and he can see her. You can also pick and choose access rights in case you wanted to use it to communicate w the grandparents, etc. There is a talk feature which allows you to talk into your device and it comes through wherever the camera is set up. We don't use this feature as our daughter would be freaked out! Ha ha. But it might be useful with other applications. Highly recommend to others!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with Dropcam HD
Reviews.Author: gt
Reviews.Content: I've had a Dropcam HD for a few months and I've found they have really advanced online video by offering a $149 HD camera that includes unlimited free streaming both upload and download.  I've been involved with and researched live video streaming and found nothing that even comes close to what Dropcam has for free.I also purchased the 7-day DVR package that archives 100% of the past 7 days video and it has worked great.

Reviews.Title: Nice device
Reviews.Author: Frequent online shopper
Reviews.Content: Very easy setup. Nice internet interface. Worked well for me without any problems. clear picture. does not tilt like other cameras.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up, allows me to check in on things from my phone.
Reviews.Author: C. Azad "cazad"
Reviews.Content: I am not very technologically inclined, and am easily frustrated by devices that are difficult to set up.  All I had to do was find a spot for the camera, connect to my wi-fi, download their app to my phone and I was done.  It's been running now for 3 weeks without any problems, glitches or failures.  I can see who is at my door from any room in the house (as long as I have my phone with me), and I can check in on my dogs from my desktop computer at work as well.  There is a slight delay - maybe two seconds - from when something happens and you see it either on your phone or desktop, but the picture is impressively clear.  I've never used a different type of wi-fi camera before, so I don't have anything to compare it to, but so far I'm pretty happy with it.  There is one thing you should know about the night viewing function though.  If you are mounting the camera to look out of a window, the window will reflect the infrared lights that surround the lens back into the camera, making it impossible to see anything in the dark unless it comes right up to the camera.  You will still see car headlights and anything that comes within a few feet of the camera, but if you want it for night vision, try to mount it where the infrared lights won't shine right back into the camera.  I had to contact technical support because I had issues starting a subscription to their DVR service, and they responded promptly and were very helpful.  I was expecting a scripted auto answer to my written question, but somebody actually read it and responded by the next day.  I would buy it again if I needed another wi-fi camera.

Reviews.Title: DROPCAM anniversary review
Reviews.Author: Cam man
Reviews.Content: Have had the Dropcam for a full year. Have thoroughly enjoyed the camera.  Original setup was a piece of cake And its function over the year has been very very good.  Indoor to outdoor viewing has been very high .  The camera works so well that I am purchasing a second unit for my home.

Reviews.Title: Minimalist camera
Reviews.Author: 2-Stage "2-Stage"
Reviews.Content: Minimalist but that's good since simplicity is wise.  That is to say, not having PT keeps the system robust.  The camera is only powered by the USB cable..really just a power cable.  The WIFI connection through DropCAM's servers saves a lot of headache.  It's high enough resolution that you really can get some decent digital zoom images.  Very useful.  And it's so small, it's easy to conceal.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: AAdams
Reviews.Content: I have 3 Dropcams and I am very happy with them. Just about 2 weeks ago one of the power adapters stopped working and I contacted them and asked to buy a new one, but they simply told me that my cams are under warranty and they would send a new power adapter. It came in about 5 days, and everything is working great again. Customer service answered to my email in less than 10 minutes .

Reviews.Title: Wifi Camera, great solution
Reviews.Author: J. R. Haigh
Reviews.Content: The other reviews convinced me to make the buy.  I sincerely like the ability to look down my driveway and have it DVR my driveway and street. Long power cord worked great, and the wifi connection, phone app all work well.  Through a window you can't use the IR night mode, but with street light the camera works great to see outside at night.  If you use the IR mode it will just see the LED emitters reflecting off the window.  Also need to avoid keeping this camera in sunlight which is tricky if you want to peer outside full time.  My second camera is baby room and could not work better.  night vision is great.note the internet bandwidth with 2 cameras for me went from 16.99 KPBS to 14.47 KPBS and uploads went from 1.50 to 1.06 for reference. You can also toggle the cameras on and off if you have more than one from the App.I'm very pleased and may even buy more at some point or they come up with an outdoor version.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup, had success with Widows, Linux, iOS 6.x
Reviews.Author: Oji John "Oji"
Reviews.Content: We purchased our Dropcam directly from Dropcam.com.  Shipping was fast and free. We are still using our free introductory 2-weeks worth of the remote DVR.Pluses: --> Setup is simple.  Image field of view is wider than that displayed by other security cameras we have.  If you don't want to tinker with your own local storage or take advantage of free storage your ISP offers, this product is a reasonable option.  Using LINUX? We used a Win8 box for camera setup, but tried out Linux/Safari later where everything appeared to function well.  Our bet is that setup will work on LINUX as well since the procedure only required a browser and access to the Internet and the product uses open source code.Response from tech support has been rapid.Ummmm: --> We have been unable to use the playback feature on an iOS 5.x device unless the camera is ON.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Schwartz
Reviews.Content: We love it.  It has served us well.  I would recommend this product to anyone who want to keep an eye on their property.

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitor for motion and sound
Reviews.Author: B Reed
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised, very pleased received on time was easy to set up with no problems. Has been running several weeks scheduled for daytime and email notifications on movement and sound. Sound pickup is very sensitive.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam
Reviews.Author: Vv
Reviews.Content: this camera works great the picture is clear and the sound is good. I wish it had battery backup or a longer cord but otherwise very happy and will be purchasing a second soon

Reviews.Title: Better than good. It's great.
Reviews.Author: Robversion2012
Reviews.Content: For the $175 I was a little skeptical that I could get good visual and two way audio. When this little camera with a small bracket arrived I was sure that they forgot to pack something. All you do is plug into your computer to setup (easy to do) and your are ready to go. No receiver or anything. You plug in the camera and I mounted mine in the corner facing out toward my kitchen and living room. I was amazed to see that I got a whole 90 degree view. The resolution was really good. The audio works well too. Both ways. I use my android phone to spy on my kids while I am away at work. They definitely think twice before they start fighting with each other. All of a sudden they hear me say from my desk at work "stop fighting over the remote". It freaks them out and they act betther than when I am actually home. For the $10/month DVR fee I pay I get 3 days of video. Whenever the kids say "I did'nt leave food all over the table it was my brother" I say lets go to the tape. My wife says "I told you to get milk at the store" I say lets go to the tape. Very strange how it made my life like a Movie.Anyway, it's awesome and worth every penny of what it costs.

Reviews.Title: Nice device.
Reviews.Author: Benjamin D Meckbach
Reviews.Content: I like it.  I'd love it if they could make the DVR feature more affordable.  It's a good first security measure or in depth baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera...especially for the money!!
Reviews.Author: alschroeder
Reviews.Content: Camera has a clear picture even when the night vision is activated. Love that I can check from my phone any where anytime. I use as a baby monitor. Don't have to worry about being out of range or any interference. Sometimes when there's a lot of movement, the camera says loading. Not sure if that is from viewing on my phone or internet connection. Overall, I love it and would like to purchase additional cameras to monitor my older kids!

Reviews.Title: Easiest camera to install ever.
Reviews.Author: The Batman
Reviews.Content: Camera has great clarity and was a snap to install.  Wish it was a little lower priced, but overall a good value.

Reviews.Title: Amazingly simple setup and access
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: They got this one right - I have had many professional and non-professional IP cameras in the past and thy make me frustrated when setting them up, finding the IP Address, changing router permissions to allow access, blah blah blahThis camera needs a dropcam account and the rest is automatic. I am a accessing it all the time to check in on the office, and even have conversations through the camera with the speak feature.Also added on the 7 day DVR because it is invaluable.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: april2010
Reviews.Content: The only reason I am not giving 5 stars is because of a slight hassle during set-up that I believe is the fault of the product/company and can somehow be fixed. The review SINCE the installation is a solid 5 stars!When I first plugged the camera in (I boguht 2 and the exact same thing happened with both cameras) the computer wouldn't recognize it to start the set-up process. I had to unplug, wait a few minutes, and plug in again (I did this 3 times) and then something clicked and suddenly everything worked. Also, when it came time to hook into my wi-fi, the camera software could not hook into it. Said it wasn't available. I spent 15 minutes online and on the phone with my wi-fi provider trying to make sure I had enough bandwidth. I did. I ended up unplugging and almost sending back, but then plugged it in one more time for good measure, and suddenly everything worked. Other than those issues, set-up really is very, very easy.I have 2 cameras, installed in the 2 rooms where my daughter and nanny spend the most time. I only ever use the app on my iPhone to watch and check in and it is a nice, clear picture. The sound is great. When I increase the volume on my phone, I can understand the conversations they are having. The picture and sound are not perfect (it doesn't look HD to me) but more than adequate for my use.I also like that I can zoom in, and although I've never had to use it, I do like the option of the talk feature in case of an emergency.I have not yet signed up for any kind of recording service, since at present it is doing a great job simply by providing me a live feed. I've used the products for about 2 weeks now.Would definitly consider one or 2 more for more rooms in my house, but at $150 a pop, that wil have to wait.

Reviews.Title: Drop Cam
Reviews.Author: ImChard
Reviews.Content: I have two dropcams at my residence to keep track of happenings and for my family to see us across the world. Also a third one across the country that lets us view our baby Grand daughter any time. Just recently we had a Bobcat in our backyard and it was thrilling to see him move about the backyard.I am glad we have these, they bring much enjoyment to our lives.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Binbiker
Reviews.Content: Wow, is this thing ever so impressive! I purchased it after hearing from a friend that he had gotten one of these cameras due to having to hire a nanny. He ended up buying 3 because he was so impressed with the camera and the features.I must say that I am absolutely impressed with this camera. The picture looks great both during the day and night. The mic picks up every little sound, if you want it to, and the speaker is a cute little feature.Everything in the description is accurate regarding this camera and I am truly glad I made the decision to purchase it!

Reviews.Title: Very nice web interface and good all-around quality but....
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend this camera to anyone who has higher than average bandwidth.  Unlike many other cameras, it is streaming video at all times as it currently has no ability to turn on only for motion or sound events.  I unwittingly purchased two additional drop cams at which point bandwidth became a constraint.  I'm no expert, but I believe all motion detection is done in the cloud - so I'm not sure local motion detection will ever be possible with this model.  The geo fencing function does help with this, but it doesn't if you want the cameras on while you are home. Otherwise, the web interface and iPhone/iPad app are well done and the camera quality seems to be above average.  It's wall mounting setup is easy and clean.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality on phone and computer!
Reviews.Author: A. Lee
Reviews.Content: We've only had the camera hooked up for about two hours, but we're very impressed.  We bought it to spy on the dog's room, when we're away from home.  The picture is crisp without needing to focus, the color's are bright, and the audio tests worked well.  We still need to try the away from home tests, but so far, this is pretty cool.Takes a little white to position and get the angles just right.  We're using indoor light, so we've no idea what natural sunlight would affect.  I downloaded the free app and bookmarked the website in no time.I think we've had about $20 worth of fun with this thing already.  Nifty gadget at a nice price.Dropcam HD Wi-Fi Wireless Video Monitoring Camera

Reviews.Title: "Apple" quality
Reviews.Author: technophobic
Reviews.Content: The feel of Dropcam is "Apple" - clean and simple, but not too simple.The wide-angle lens covers a lot of ground (much negating a need for a tilting camera - in electronics, avoid anything mechanical, mechanical breaks first) and does so without skewing the picture too much.  From the corner of a room, you can see all four walls and everything that is in the room - no room to hide.The software that enhances low-light situations (before the infra-red mode kicks in, automatically, for total darkness) is truly amazing.  (Samsung has similar low-light software included in its latest smartphone.  The software sets the new standard for cameras.)The mic on the camera is pretty good too.  I have turned down the mic's sensitivity to one third but I can still hear myself typing on the keyboard 15 feet away from the camera.The Dropcam delay is about 2 or 3 seconds.  The next best thing for baby monitoring is sitting next to the baby.With all this goodness, don't overdo things: Don't try to control the camera from two computers at the same time, the Dropcam software gets pretty confused.  When prompted in  the set-up phase, don't try to economize on buffer space, give it at least 20 or 50 MB.  Don't use Dropcam in places with marginal wifi strength.  And where wifi is average, don't use HD (although the sharpness of HD is a pleasure to look at).Without HD, you also cut back on the number of bytes flowing over the internet - you can lower the 60GB per month quoted elsewhere down to 25GB and still have the camera on all the time.Turning the camera remotely OFF and ON takes a few minutes to settle, and you may have to press Refresh (F5) if the "wheel" on the screen keeps spinning much longer - better, leave the camera ON all the time if you can.  (Mine has now been going for a week without a single problem, have not touched the camera one time.  Any intermittent wifi hick-up between camera and router is resolved automatically, in seconds.)Finally, at least in my situation there is no need for the DVR service so the subscription part of Dropcam can be dropped, no monthly fees.I am hard to please but Dropcam gets five stars!PS:  I also looked into the Foscam alternative.  Its reviews are good too but over the most recent 50 "verified purchases" the Dropcam reviews are better.  Besides, some of the Foscam reviews mention how good Foscam's Customer Service is.  Hello, you don't want to talk to Customer Service, the product should be user-friendly enough so you don't have to call for help.

Reviews.Title: One of the best CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Amrish
Reviews.Content: I like this because I could able to set this up in not more than 30 secs. I tried couple of others CAM but they were not good as this. Clarity is also superb. I like this product.Only one thing I think is missing in this camera is the ability to rotate the camera while you are away.I would definitely recommend this product to give it a shot.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam HD in the UK
Reviews.Author: Albert
Reviews.Content: I guess I am one of the few people currently using Dropcam HD in the UK where it is not yet sold.  However, despite this the unit has performed flawlessly.  The picture quality (though obviously not true HD) is very good.  Setup was very simple and support questions have been answered promptly and helfully.  All in all a super little product, as long as you have a reasonably fast and generous broadband facility (on 24/7 the unit itself uses about 60GB of bandwith per month).

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: E. Morse "eastm"
Reviews.Content: This camera was VERY quick and easy to set up and install, picture and sound quality is excellent, and I love how easy it is to check in on my children throughout the day from my computer and smart phone. I do wish I could pan and zoom in easier; it lets you zoom in on either the center or one of the four quadrants of the video, but this has to be done in "settings" and you can't just click somewhere on the video picture itself to easily zoom in and out. But for the price, this camera does exactly what I wanted and more.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Richard Lattimer
Reviews.Content: I've had the camera for a day now, and like it so much I ordered another one this morning. It does everything advertised and that's saying something in this hyped world. The quality of the picture is first rate with only a little jerkiness once in a while, but not all the time, so not a problem for me. The only thing I would like to see is the ability to pan and zoom from the viewing screen rather than going to settings to change the viewing.All in all its a great product for the money and I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Web Cam
Reviews.Author: clydo
Reviews.Content: This is very easy to setup and is a great webcam!Cam view it from your iphone.. and it send motion alerts via text or email.Love it.

Reviews.Title: I love It
Reviews.Author: hyuenjr
Reviews.Content: Very good resolution, very friendly set up and instant rendition. We have two and they deliver better than expected. We have other kind of cameras for comparison, and the resolution and sound of this cameras are unbelievable!

Reviews.Title: Drop-Down Camera
Reviews.Author: Jim L. Parker
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this product.  Cannot zoom but performance is excellent including night vision.  No regrets for this choice and purchase.  Price paid for performance was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Ease of set-up
Reviews.Author: Stephen Freedhoff
Reviews.Content: I had considerable difficulty in setting up a previous cam due to "port forwarding" etc.Dropcam set-up was a breeze.Night time vision and"talk" facility are nice extrasI would like to have had the opportunity of customizing the frequency of emails on motion detection- once every 30 minutes is not sufficient for me.I have only had Dropcam up and running for less than a month.I have not yet determined why I am receiving so many alerts on motion detection

Reviews.Title: Best security system for the money
Reviews.Author: C
Reviews.Content: With a little up front investment, you can have a great, web based security system.  The motion detection is very sensitive (which is great).  The color for day and the image quality at night/IR are both pretty good.  The price for 7 day buffering of video can't be beat right now.  If I had anything that needed improving, it would be the camera base.....it is functional, but it could be better.  Don't get me wrong, if definitely does the job....I just think it could do a better job.  Because the wire hangs down below the camera, it makes it somewhat awkward to position the camera (wants to twist in the mount slightly).  It has a good wall mount that works well....but the wire has to come off the side instead of straight down.  If there was a slot for the wire to go straight up then it would be perfect.  I would like to see a similar suction cup mount for the base in order to mount it on a window facing outside.  This is being extremely picky because everything else is so user friendly (the setup is extremely simple).  I own 3 now and will be ordering a 4th.

Reviews.Title: very pleased with this little critter
Reviews.Author: Julie Stielstra
Reviews.Content: So little and kind of cute, but it serves our purposes nicely to keep an eye on our vacation home.  Only problem has been the occasional drop off the WiFi, but we discovered mice had chewed through the internet cable, so it wasn't Dropcam's fault!  Installed within minutes with no difficulty; just installed the app for Droid cell phone and that was also seamless.  Only wish would be a weather-proof option for mounting outdoors.  Overall, very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: 2nd one purchased
Reviews.Author: Debra L. Marks "debbiemarks"
Reviews.Content: Highly reco.  This is the second one we have ordered.  Perfect for carports, inside the house.  Very easy to hook up

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Susan M Brongiel
Reviews.Content: The only reason I did not give this a five star is because it sometimes goes off with no real motion. Otherwise it provides a nice picture of the room it's viewing even at night it's really clear! I use this to view my vacation home to check for intruders, but also wanted it for observation if storms come through any potential water damage in my home. I will probably get one more just so I have one more vantage point.

Reviews.Title: I love Dropcam
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I have 3 cameras and love it. Zero problems out of this product in the 4 months I have had them. I will be purchasing a few more to cover every area of the house. The only features I would like to see in the future is the ability to pan & tilt from the app. Also it would be nice if you could hook up a DVR yourself to the cameras instead of having to purchase service through Dropcam. Their DVR service for a year is a lot more expensive than being able to hook one of my own up. However I still give this product 5 Stars. Dropcam backs up their promises with a quality inexpensive product.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam HD Wi-fi Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Poletti
Reviews.Content: This unit is great! A very clear picture and set up takes about 5 mins. Nothing like the early home surveillance cams that needed a static IP address this cam Works!!! and you can view on smart phone also.

Reviews.Title: Missed Requirements
Reviews.Author: VA Duck
Reviews.Content: The OVERALL design and functionality of the Dropcam certainly deserves the high ratings average on this Amazon web page! If you are willing to subscribe to the DVR option - this camera will probably be a 5-star success for you.  However, I will (respectfully) rate & review the Dropcam according to the way that it met and missed my requirements.I needed a camera that 1) Images in high resolution, 2) detects motion - 3) takes a brief video - 4) e-mials one (or more) of the video frames at FULL Resolution to my e-mail account and 5) does NOT require a "subscription service". The application is front door monitoring - with the ability to readily recognize the face of the visitor (or intruder). Here is how the Dropcam meets these requirements:1) While the digital array is generous (720 x  1280 pix, 30 fps) its effect is minimized by the very-broad 107º optical angle. (# of pixels devoted to a face sized area is minimal with the camera mounted <6' away)2) The e-mail alert works well, but the attached video image is a very low resolution reduction from an original and insufficient for facial recognition.3) Retrieving full resolution requires a subscription.4) The motion detection somewhat precedes video imaging. The image supplied in the e-mail alert occasionally shows a scene with NO human content.5) The motion detection is impractically sensitive, alerting with light changes or very slight foliage motion.6) Transmitting MB of video data all-day (and night) long when only video following a motion detection is required is inefficient use of bandwidth for my application.Positives:setup is dead simple - no tech savviness requiredthe camera is small and elegantly designedthe resolution is impressive (though the effect is somewhat sacrificed due to the wide angle optics)the e-mail alert is very fastthe Android app worked very well to control and monitor the video & audioIn the end I returned the camera (thanks Amazon!) because it did not meet my requirements. That said it IS a 1st rate product if its parameters work for you.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Happy
Reviews.Content: This product is the greatest. Very simple to set up. The picture is fantastic. I spent the winter 1000 miles away and could check out my house whenever

Reviews.Title: Works great but costs $ to "remember" and needs line of site
Reviews.Author: BronzeOwl "BronzeOwl"
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty technical and it took quite a while to fine tune and get the Dropcam to work perfectly.  After 3 days of experimenting, I determined that the Dropcam needs to be placed so that it is line of site to the router.  I have 2.4 MHz cordless phones and my wireless devices can "see" many neighboring Wifi routers.  The successfully placed drop cam is about 20 feet from the D-Link DIR-655 router.  The other consideration is having to pay to "remember" the recorded events.  On the other hand, once you pay, you can review event histories, capture these histories and download them to your PC as MP4's or JPG's.  Motion detection works great as does the "night vision".  The Hi Definition pictures are good, but facial feature distinction could be better.  The PTZ is not really PTZ but rather a way to zoom in on a portion of the field of view.  Another plus is if someone breaks in to your house and steals the Dropcam, it's too late.  You've already captured their image and it is on a California server at Dropcam Inc.  No way can the thief destroy the recording.  The PC, iPhone App and iPad Apps are all different presentations.  The iPad App shows live motion of more than one Dropcam at a time.  The PC and iPhone only shows "live" one at a time.

Reviews.Title: easy fast simple
Reviews.Author: Zenozor
Reviews.Content: Simple to set up, fast to install, good image & sound. Interface works great and it's helpful to get the notification when there is motion detected.

Reviews.Title: Only web cam the wife trusts
Reviews.Author: Tango
Reviews.Content: Best webcam on the market from a great company. Very easy set up. And works fantastically well. Particularly great is the night vision this camera offers, among tons of other features.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and functional
Reviews.Author: Dave Wilson
Reviews.Content: Easy set up and a useful tool for general surveillance.  DVR service is simple and automated all for a very reasonable cost.  Much superior to D-Link product.

Reviews.Title: I can see my son!
Reviews.Author: SK
Reviews.Content: I'm a working mom, when I was about to go back to work after my son's born, I was worried. my husband put this camera in our living room where my son spends most time during day, so I can see him realtime from work using web browser or via my iphone. I love it I can hear him and I can even talk to him. the first week I came back to work, I watched him a lot but then I started feeling better by seeing him play and eat and sleep well. now I don't watch him all the time but during lunch break and before I go to pump, it's nice to see him on this camera. I've recommended this cam to all other friends new moms or looking for new cams.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jennifer M
Reviews.Content: This is really a simple format but being able to have the view available on my smartphone is great.  Yes I agree with others there are some things that would be nice to have, but I think overall it is great.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Easy Set-up and Good Operation
Reviews.Author: Coolcar1
Reviews.Content: Take it out of the box, plug it in to your computer, select what wireless signal to connect to, unplug it from computer, move it to where you want to view and plug it into an outlet. Really, it is that easy. I am very pleased to have bought this item.You do have to have a good wireless signal. This camera works good throughout most of the house but if you have dead spots you will need to get a wifi range extender to fill in the holes- just like for any other wireless device. I have purchased the WD My Net wifi range extender so that I can fill in the dead spots AND monitor the chicken house about 100 feet from the main house. I used this camera out there and found the signal dropped out occasionally. The range extender arrives tomorrow and I'll see how that helps. So far, as long as I'm in range everything works flawlessly.Range extender arrived and successfully establishes great connectivity with the Dropcam. Since then I have bought 3 more Dropcams and they all work fantastic. I am now monitoring 4 areas- Chicken house and 3 inside the house.

Reviews.Title: This is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Nicki V.
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a way to keep an eye on our children while we were gone.  They weren't kidding with the quick and easy set up. No need to fuss with URLs or other crap I have no knowledge of.  Connect to your computer to connect the camera to your home wifi, then place in your home where ever you like.  I downloaded the app on my iPhone and iPad and can check it any time I want.  I can turn it on and off from my phone/pad outside of the house, or from my computer.  The night vision is pretty cool too.  There is also a motion-detection feature that is pretty cool. Also, if you request the DVR services, when you are viewing the video footage, you just skip to the parts where there is movement/action.  There is a slight delay in viewing, and I mean VERY slight, could be my home internet.  Picture is clear.  So far, no problems.  Thinking about getting a few more.

Reviews.Title: Very good but has a little lag
Reviews.Author: Gerardo C. Guzman Lozano
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great quality, very well made, small, you can take apart the lens from the base and put it were you want it, hidden or something. It is very simple to set up almost plug and play, you just follow the instructions.To set it up to a wifi you always need a computer, any computer, so if you plan to bring it to your friends house or somewhere else, you will require a computer to set up your friends wifi password to the camera, then once you are back in your home you will be doing the same again, it does not stores networks.You can see your camera online, and on iphone/ipad and others I think.The only con is that it has like a 3 secs lag! be aware of that!

Reviews.Title: Love this thing!
Reviews.Author: Patrick Incio
Reviews.Content: Originally bought 2 but loved it so much that I got 1 more with plans to get more in the near future. Had to up my broadband but well worth it. Now I can keep am eye on my place all the time. Wish I could record to my own instead of theirs.

Reviews.Title: The best!
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: We set these up at our cabin so we could see the weather and how much snow we have in the winter. We just love them! It literally took 3 minute to create an account and set up. If we tired of the view, we just unplug from the wall outlet and plug in somewhere else. It reconnects itself in seconds. Our internet provider changes the IP address daily and this great little webcam somehow changes with it. We have never lost connection. I like all the features it offers for an outstanding competitive price. Three of our friends have gotten them as well and they love them too. Get a few today, you won't be sorry!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Stacey Hernandez
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything Dropcam claims it to do.  The picture is clear and the mic on the camera is VERY sensitive, which is good when you use it to watch over your baby.  I will be purchasing a few cameras soon.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: joe daee
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up, nice image, as advertised more or less.  Would buy again.  One thing, the pan feature is nonexistent.  You can zoom using simple image location settings.  That's not panning.  Still, really love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Price ~ Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Jonna Sztamenits
Reviews.Content: I love this product!  I was looking for something that I could monitor my animals while I am away during the day.  I love the fact that it works not only with my computer but since I am always on the go, I can get updates of any activity on my phone!  Many of my friends have purchased this item after seeing what it can do!

Reviews.Title: its awesome
Reviews.Author: J. Metesh
Reviews.Content: It Lets me keep a eye on the Dogs while I'm at work.This is Money VERY  well spent! I may get another one.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Kims opinion
Reviews.Content: Love these cameras and they were extremely easy to set up.  I do have some issues with the cameras dropping offline (I have 5 cameras set thru out my home) but thats probably from my internet connection and not an issue with the cameras.  A support tech suggested I change the view from HD to normal and that did help.  Also love that as soon as the camera detects movement, it automatically begins recording (so your not stuck with hours of useless recordings.) Definitely recommend the Dropcam HD Wi-Fi Wireless Camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Product - Outstanding Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: We have purchased 3 drop cams. We loved the first one and got the additional ones. We have e en given one away as a house warming present. When we had an issue with it we sent an email an received immediate satisfaction. We are customers for life.

Reviews.Title: Sweet
Reviews.Author: Cameron
Reviews.Content: Nice clear pictureEasy to useEasy set upUse iPad and iPhone to monitor sometimes it takes Turing camera off and back on again to get new recorded images to show up in history.Going to buy three more

Reviews.Title: Truly Excellent Cam
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This Dropcam has everything I was looking for:  HD video quality, good choice for field of view on the lens, simple wireless connectivity, night vision, small and unobtrusive, continuous video storage, alert notification for motion or sound, simple to install and use, and reasonable price.  Especially impressive is that I receive notifications and can view video on my cell phone (Galaxy Note II), my Nexus 7 tablet or my PC - anytime / anyplace.  I have this installed in a vacation house in Mexico and pick up the video feed nicely from a US location - there is no blocking of URLs from out of the country.  I can even talk to an intruder and warn him off with the two way voice - right from my phone.  Everything performs as advertised.  A couple relatively minor things I would like to see improved are:  add dual-band WiFi for better wireless range - I had to move my WiFi router into the same room with the Dropcam to be sure it had a strong enough connection to stay reliably on; a little better mechanical mount - it could be tighter.  I will also note that running continuous video generates a lot of data to sift through if you have a problem.  I do get quite a few false alarms from occasional noise outside the house, but probably better that than not.  The mike is quite sensitive so "hears" stuff that even you might miss if you were there.  All in all, this does an amazingly good job compared to available alternatives.  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Best product ever!!
Reviews.Author: reene53
Reviews.Content: These cameras are not only a "camera" it's a baby monitor, pet watcher, security camera, family cam and more! You can hear sound and talk out of the camera! Picture quality is awesome and the infrared feature is great! I have one in my garage to watch for break-ins and I feel so safe! And another on the main floor watching the area! The app is great and easy to use and check on cameras from anywhere! New features in the app are great too- to turn off alerts when ur home automatically ect.. Can't say enough good things about dropcam!!

Reviews.Title: Dropcam
Reviews.Author: JimontheBeach
Reviews.Content: I've messed with half a dozen ip cameras over the past few years.  NONE have been as easy to use as Dropcam.  Follow the instructions and in less than one minute you are ready to go.  Has a good range (it's in the garage, about 70' from my access point and works fine.  If it does drop (me using a circular saw and spiking the power line?) it automatically hooks back up.  The newest feature, scheduling time or location adds a lot to its flexibility.The only reason I give it four stars as opposed to five?  Not weatherproof. Yet. Going to only every use it inside? *****

Reviews.Title: Amazing....
Reviews.Author: kazeid
Reviews.Content: i literally tried all ip and wireless cameras in the world!!the drop cam is by far the best!! i would 100% recommend it

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: asha1077
Reviews.Content: I received my dropcam yesterday and it took seconds to set up. I'm able to view feed from my android phone. Camera is every that I expected and more. Love it!The only thing that I wish I could change; the stand is silver and wish it would have come with a black stand so it's not so noticeable. If it was all black it would blend better into the furniture. Other than that, love my new dropcam! Worth every penny!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing device. The Apple of web cams.
Reviews.Author: Seafood Licorice
Reviews.Content: We bought this item to monitor our condo during a termite tenting. And I have to say I was amazed by how useful and reliable it was. First of all, being able to completely control the device via the iOS app was a revelation. 10 years ago, people probably spent tens of thousands for this sort of monitoring. Now it can be bought for about a hundred dollars! I especially loved getting the alerts straight to my phone and being able to see what was happening within seconds.Highlights:* Night vision works remarkably well* Regular definition video streaming was still of sufficient quality* The UI of the iOS app is great - extremely easy to use on iPhone or iPad. You control everything from your phone.* DVR recording is useful - though I wouldn't really need it unless I was leaving town (I wonder if you can activate it for short periods of time and then cancel/pause it??)* No WiFi drop outs - the cam was always accessible for the 4 days we used it and we don't have a strong signal* Motion detection is sensitive! I considered this a good thing since you know it's working. An insect tripped it off one time, as did curtains blowing in the wind from a long distance.It would be great if in a future release you could have the ability to turn the camera remotely to get wider visibility - but it's hardly essential. If you're looking for a WiFi camera, this is a sure bet. Really impressed.

Reviews.Title: Way Cool!
Reviews.Author: Trace & Lacey Staker
Reviews.Content: The color and HD image is amazing on this little camera! its fun to just check it on my iphone on the pups at home while and work and take pics of them! really easy set up and looks slick and clean even in the box! Great purchase!

Reviews.Title: All we had hoped for
Reviews.Author: Daniel Stillion
Reviews.Content: Easy set up. Comes back up reliably if network goes down for some reason. Good field of view. Good night vision for our needs. Tivo-like service with motion capture events is great tool

Reviews.Title: Worked great
Reviews.Author: B. Robinson "Texas Aggie Fan"
Reviews.Content: I highly reccomend Dropcam. We used it to check on our horse as she was preparing to have a foal. We did not mis one minute of the process and I was able to share the link to increase the number of eyes on her. This took care of a tremendous amount of anxiety b/c I aslo had to work. I was able to log in on my iPad and iPhone while at work, while my son wathched on his android and my parents caught it all on their computer. Our veternarian was so amazed he said he was going to get one too.Due to my lighting I had to turn the Night vision on manually but that really wasn't a problem. The images were fantastic. I was using it with a Mifi from Verizon. Consumed a lot of data but I have one of those old unlimited plans.Expect about 40Gig per month if used constantly.Excellent buy

Reviews.Title: Love this little camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa P. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I have had my dropcam for about two weeks and love it. Clear picture, reliable, and I unboxed it and had it running in two minutes.  I was amazed.  I plan to take this one to the beach house later this week and purchase another one to replace this one in my home.  The one I have here is inside the front glass window, and motion detection is right on, although there is a little delay in the motion notification.  Can't wait until there is one for outdoors!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for weekend cabin!
Reviews.Author: buyer101
Reviews.Content: It was delivered quickly and I had it set up and connected in about 20 minutes.  We've been using it for 6 weeks without any problems.  The video feed is amazing for such an inexpensive camera.  We have ours set up looking out the window at our favorite view so we can be there for a few minutes any time we want to.  It does need WIFI, but not a computer.

Reviews.Title: Toddler monitor
Reviews.Author: Crazy Al
Reviews.Content: We use this as a toddler monitor, I don't think it would replace a baby monitor, but it is great for peaking in on our toddler at nap time or if she gets up in the middle of the night.  Super easy to set up, and great access from computer, Android tablet and phone, and an iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to set up and use
Reviews.Author: Banjo
Reviews.Content: This was very easy to set up. It took about 15 mins to get it running. I just stuck it on top of a surround speaker. It's not cheap though. It quite useful though. It allows us to keep an eye on our kids (one is min pin, the other is golden) when we're out and a thunderstorm is heading toward the house. They don't like it when the weather is changing.

Reviews.Title: Amazing.
Reviews.Author: SusanG
Reviews.Content: We have searched high and low for a good wireless security camera.  This one is perfect for our needs, and very easy to get set up.  I only wish they made one for outdoor use!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, but...
Reviews.Author: federationofideas
Reviews.Content: The camera is great.  Picture quality is amazing and the software has tons of features.  The server does seem to have some issues and loose connectivity quite often.  Customer service has been helpful in trying to figure out the problem

Reviews.Title: Easy, Economical. You choose how invasive.
Reviews.Author: Allyn
Reviews.Content: Super easy and fast to install. Nice clear image, crisp sound, so many functions and options, it exceeded my expectations. I have one that just is pointed at two doors to see the comings and goings of an unprotected room filled with good stuff. Once you're in, you are no longer monitored. Works on my iPad and iPhone using the app. You can add a subscription that records 24/7 (7 days at a time) if you need to refer back to a day or time. Even without the subscription, it will send a text or email alert if you set it up that way. I love seeing how often the cat goes in and out! I recommend the Dropcam. This technology just gets easier and better.

Reviews.Title: where have you been all my life?
Reviews.Author: Greg Gustin
Reviews.Content: So easy to use.  And it's like they read my mind on how it should work.  I am so very satisfied.  Well Done!

Reviews.Title: Dropcam HD Wi-Fi Wireless Video Monitoring Camera
Reviews.Author: David S.
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with the equipment received. All items were packaged well and I'm already looking to purchase another DropCam in the future.The only down side is that it would be nice if you could have the unit turn off/on automatically at certain times of the day instead of having to do it manually. But for the price and quality you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: quick and easy but features lacking
Reviews.Author: nom de cam
Reviews.Content: If you need to set up a video feed in a hurry this is your product. If you have time to go around the learning curve or need advanced features keep going.Dropcam is a nice unit, appears to be well built, has a good picture in HD or standard mode. Dropcam is lacking in some of the advanced features which - if you aren't going to use might not matter. There is an alert mode that can send you a text message when the Dropcam detects sound, motion, or goes offline. First, one of my cams went offline for a day and I never got a message. The real problem though is the sound or motion alerts. There is no way to set up a schedule of when it will alert you or what level of motion will set off the alert. A chihuahua, cat, or the sun coming out from behind the clouds have all triggered alerts on my cams. On Dropcams support page this feature was suggested in April of 2012 (and me too'd! by over 60 people) but still nothing.The PC interface for viewing the cams works well. The android app is less feature rich but does work. I haven't tried the Apple app.

Reviews.Title: Easy installation.
Reviews.Author: fla.gal
Reviews.Content: My husband set these cameras up on our home computer without complaining!!  The cameras themselves were easy to install, you just need electricity.  We live in a stilt house and the camera is under the house above the carport.  It picks up the wifi signal with no problem.It takes great pictures, but it takes a couple of seconds after the motion is detected before it snaps the shot.  We have the pictures sent to our email and have signed up for $99/year, per camera, for the dropcam company to hold one week's worth of video for us to review.  Overall, we are happy with the purchase.  We have a friend with several of these cameras and he likes them too.

Reviews.Title: as described
Reviews.Author: Gucciya
Reviews.Content: the cam is very easy to installthe pictures are clear and it has a very nice coverageits only few seconds delay from live

Reviews.Title: Great audio quality
Reviews.Author: Vettegal1
Reviews.Content: I love the camera for my business. I have found out several things I did not know while I was away from my business the cat did play. Whatever is said is clearly heard. You might find out what people really think about you or are doing while you are away from your business. The only thing I do not like about the camera is it takes so long to zoom in on what you want to see and then it is only one shot of closeness and still not close enough. All in all a good system but could use some upgrades in zoom.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up remote viewing but that's about it
Reviews.Author: E. Coronel
Reviews.Content: The biggest pain is the software and the apps (iphone and android). When it does connect I sometimes it keeps loading the video stream. Forget the android app. That's totally useless as I have NEVER been able to connect to the camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Asheville Distilling Co.
Reviews.Content: This product is so easy to use. it gives Plug and Play / Easy whole new meanings! Hate the limit on them tho.

Reviews.Title: Wow! update.............
Reviews.Author: raaaaaa
Reviews.Content: I have to say that this product works amazingly, I use various cans for security and whatnot in the past this is by far the easiest to install and it works amazingly. They give you the full ride for the first 15 days meaning you get to see everything it has to offer but after that you have to pay hundred dollars a year..Seems like a lot for the extra bells and whistles but I have to admit I am deathly consideringupdate..i now have a couple of these some purchased here and another bought from the company directly...they are working great but i have to say now that i own more than 3 units i cant bring myself to pay the monthly VIG for the DVR service. it just cost way to much. i have to add the service for one camera only, how do you choose witch one?they should have have a special for owning more than 3 cameras. as it stands now i would have to pay $10 for the 1st camera and $5 for each one a month, which in my case depending on how many i connect to there service can be at least $25+ a month............thats already as much as a full fledged security system

Reviews.Title: Who Said This Was Easy?
Reviews.Author: Don Bob
Reviews.Content: Set-up was extremely easy but that's where easy ended. I have tried this camera at 2 locations and on 2 computers and I've never been able to send or receive an image other than the one I saw at set-up.Tech support is a cruel joke! If you can ever get someone to answer the phone, that person probably can't troubleshoot but will take your name & number to have someone get back to you. I'm still waiting as I pack the unit up to return to Amazon for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, iffy "online all the time" requirement
Reviews.Author: M Edward Thoza
Reviews.Content: Camera has a decent picture and was really easy to setup. I am wary of anything that requires a monthly service though, what if the company disappears in 2 years?ProImageEase of useAndroid app is goodConGets hotHave to access a 3rd party website to view

Reviews.Title: Is my dropcam blocked
Reviews.Author: Abdulrahman Alharthy "Jounior"
Reviews.Content: This product is excellent choice for online camera ,whatever it seem not working out side U.S  the problem  is no Detected Wi-Fi network I have more than 20 wi-fi no one founded I tried 4G ,3G ,2g even desl line no network i did what support said they was not helping . I think dropcam don't want this product used in outside U.S I will return it .

Reviews.Title: definitely the best of its type
Reviews.Author: Scott Phillips
Reviews.Content: I admit, I've had a few issues with dropcam. It doesn't work as a hotel room monitoring device through most hotel firewalls. No biggie. It uses quite a lot of bandwidth per day (around 400k/s) so my internet is noticably slower when its on. Thats the bad. The good is that setting up dropcam is so easy you can give it to non-tech people and have them do it. I gave one to a 60 year old friend and he set it up straight away. The ipad, iphone and android app are all excellent.This is not for everyone. If you want multiple cameras a foscam is going to be better for you. If you hate paying for subsciption, you dont want this, because you really need the DVR service. If you want the quickest, hassle free security monitoring and DVR service this is for you.I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Drop "signal" cam more like it
Reviews.Author: ADUB
Reviews.Content: So, yes, this was packaged well and easy to open and set up. Sadly, the room I need it most has weak-ish wifi, and the camera kept dropping. This would freeze up both my iPad2 and my Galaxy s3. So, back she goes to amazon. I cannot say that this is dropcam's fault, but there should be some notice somewhere that reminds potential buyers that the signal for wifi must be strong and consistent where the camera will be placed.

Reviews.Title: new update freezes androids
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: Was fine at first but now after the update every recorded event freezes on droid phones and Xoom. Works okay still on my laptop but it used to work flawlessly across all devices! Shouldn't have updated for my purposes I needed to see on my phone recorded events. Sent back thanks for having a good return policy amazon!

Reviews.Title: Easy setup and Good performance
Reviews.Author: Tripemonkey
Reviews.Content: First review on Amazon (at least I don't recall any others).This does pretty much everything I wanted it to do. Extremely fast to set up (was viewing it on my iPhone about 5 minutes after I unboxed it). Motion activated alerts on mobile devices. Night vision works very well. Microphone picks up sound very well. Online DVR service (optional for $10/mo) is great. Easy to make/keep video clips from the DVR recording.As you might expect, there's some delay when speaking THROUGH the camera from a mobile device, and the speaker on the camera isn't really that loud. So I can't imagine having any sort of lengthy conversation through the camera. But the talk function does work. I have to admit, though, that I've only used it for messing with the dog when I'm away.All in all, I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: ONLY WORKED FOR A FEW DAYS!!
Reviews.Author: G. F. THOMAS "fredth"
Reviews.Content: I had it connected in very little time 5 days ago. So far no disconnect problems and very clear view on iPad,iMac and iPhone from any where in house and 15 miles away in town. I was surprised to find out I could let my son-in-law watch it from his house 35 miles away by letting him connect to mine on his Android phone. The sound and motion detectors both work great. The infrared works very good in my house also.I intend to purchase a second one for my basement so as to have both floors covered. For the price ,I find it a very good value. Time will tell if it holds up.As for simple to connect it,i had it up and running in very short time. It is very easy to to connect to,as I am not that much of a technical person and like simple connections for all my  products!  April 4th update!!!!! So much for the good review! Today i started to town and wanted to turn on my cam as i went in and couldn't get it on my iPhone. I thought maybe i should have had it on at home so when i got home i tried to reconnect it again nothing. I went to the Dropcam site and looked for an answer. The answer was that a lot of them are dropping connectivity. They said they were working to solve the problem. Mine is going back tomorrow, i bought it to watch my home when i'm gone on my iphone or iPad. If it is not going to stay connected what good would it be to me? The first week it worked great so i do not know what is going on ,when their sight said they have a problem.

Reviews.Title: Device was Dead-On-Arrival, and supplier is slow to replace
Reviews.Author: Alfred H. Hauer
Reviews.Content: I received this webcam timely enough, but it would not setup on 4 different computers, trying two different cables.  DOA!  I called DropCam customer service, and was told a replacement would be shipped the next business day.  It's been FIVE business days, and I still haven't been given a tracking number.  In addition, there were duplicate messages from the fulfillment dept and FedEx regarding the RMA shipping label.  I gave this two stars instead of only one, since my impression of the initial quality was good.

Reviews.Title: Drop am
Reviews.Author: Jhacker
Reviews.Content: Great product. Works great.  Love it will recommended it to friends and family as often as I can for now

Reviews.Title: Tried it out.
Reviews.Author: micheal boyes
Reviews.Content: I like the idea that it was easy to setup and it records on dropcam site. Will try for a few weeks but also like the foscam which you can record to computer or portforward and save to a cloud online also for a fee.

Reviews.Title: Not Reliable for Remote Use
Reviews.Author: Paul G. Gertenbach
Reviews.Content: Regrettably, mine had to be returned. First I must say that after decades of experience with computers and electronics, I DO believe this item may work flawlessly in some situations. Other reviews are a testament to that fact.But it is NOT plug-and-play in all situations and certainly was not in mine. I have fast fiber optic Internet with a very recent top of the line Linksys router. I bought the unit two weeks before leaving on a vacation with the intention of having it remotely monitor a particular room in the house. I first set up the camera within visual distance of the router to make sure it worked. There were occasional problems with it spontaneously disconnecting from my network. These were always fixable by a reset using the button on the back. I also noticed that even when the camera was functional, Live View often showed a loading icon rather that the current scene.After a few weeks of tweaking, trying things like static IP's, etc. I finally set up the camera in the target area. The room has a strong and consistent wireless signal and can easily handle fast upload and downloads without problems. The camera seemed to be working for 24-48 hours, but again disconnected itself from the network. This time I tried just a simple power cycling and it came back on-line.I subscribed to the Dropcam web service and left on a vacation of over two weeks. I was able to use both a PC and iPad app to monitor the camera, although the same annoying "loading" icon appeared on Live View. After about two days, the camera disconnected itself. Obviously since I was gone there was no other network traffic originating from my home and also no way to do a power cycle or hard reset.I think the camera has good build quality, but must have some design flaws in either firmware, software or both that prevent it from delivering on the most important feature for a system of this type: RELIABILITY. I really have no idea why it cannot maintain constant wireless communication in an area that easily supports other devices. Although as another reviewer mentioned, it really requires lots of bandwidth. I would have much preferred a system that could record to my own home server, which is hardwired to my network. I will be looking for such a device this week.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, sends alerts to my I phone, wish I could zoom for closer facial recognition. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants to keep an eye on things at home.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Cefi Jozef Kamhi "cefi's results"
Reviews.Content: perfect product as expectedworks well and efficient but subscription expensive.......should be cheaper to get servicemaybe next time a smaller version

Reviews.Title: What a great device.
Reviews.Author: Larry V. Comstock
Reviews.Content: I've been looking for something like this  for some time and saw a review in Popular Science. Had to have one. Have been using it on and off for four months as we travel for short periods. Knowing that anything happening at home  is recorded and can be easily transferred to my tablet, allows great piece of mind.We can even check in with a neighbor as he checks the house daily when we are gone (reciprocal activity).Actually scared the heck out of him the first time I used the voice feature.I have it on Wi-Fi through a DSL internet connection. Have only experienced two interruptions of about 20 minutes each.Must say that the bulk of viewing is rather boring, with light changes triggering most events. I'm pleased with the night vision, a bit fuzzy but clear enough to see whats going on. Utterly amazed me that night vision is a standard feature. On the other hand, no activity is just grand.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: barbara
Reviews.Content: I love this product. Was super easy and fast to set up. I can watch my home and kids from work on my cell phone! How cool is that? Picture and sound quality are amazing. Great value for the price considering the peace of mind it brings. The only way I could think to improve it would be disguise it in a stuffed animal or picture frame so no one can spot the camera. My husband and I went to great lengths to keep our nanny from being able to spot it. Otherwise, it is fabulous.

Reviews.Title: Great baby cam for the price
Reviews.Author: Etechhy
Reviews.Content: Love this product, it would get 5 stars if it didn't drop connection so much.  I know my wireless is stable, so I blame the product.  Also the wall mount is not great quality, it bracket barely holds the base in place.  Other than that it's great to view on our ipad and my android phone.  Speaker is a bit weak but it works.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly for me!
Reviews.Author: Stabob130
Reviews.Content: I was really excited about buying Dropcams after seeing them at a friend's house -- then skeptical after reading the reviews here. I ordered 2 and have them set up to keep an eye on my dog while at work (and for security).So far, they are working perfectly -- no drop in video, the quality is great while watching from work, no purple halo (as described by other reviewers).It's worth noting we have a great wifi connection thru Verizon FiOS and since starting the DVR feature, there hasn't been any noticeable lag in signal when using Netflix, Spotify, or operating our NEST thermostat, which also uses WiFi to some degree.Our wireless router is on the 2nd floor + 1 Dropcam is nearby while the other one is quite a distance downstairs.  No problems with accessing footage while at work.So far, very happy -- the ONLY reason I'm not giving it 5-stars is I do agree, $9.99 for 7-day storage of footage + $4.99 each additional camera seems excessive.  I'd like to get another cam but not plopping down more than $15 for footage that I'm only recording *if* something were to happen.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Marshall Steeves
Reviews.Content: This is an incredibly simple device.  Not only is it simple to set up, but it works perfectly.  The quality is incredible and the apps work seamlessly with my iPod touch and iPad mini.  It is a wonderful product.  I can not say enough about it.

Reviews.Title: This is a great product!!
Reviews.Author: Seakyte
Reviews.Content: We researched other video surveillance cameras on line and selected the dropcam based upon the review of others. We were not disappointed! the dropcam is very easy to install and there is an app which can be used by I pad and I phone. The wide  angle lens on the camera is great and allows zooming in to the center or sides of the viewing area. We use it regularly to check on a condo rental and our dogs. it is a good product which delivers on the representations made on the web page. Highly recommended!!

Reviews.Title: Like HD Picture
Reviews.Author: K.D.
Reviews.Content: Easy to install start working in less then 5 minute. No Cons, I wish if they can make outdor camera like this.

Reviews.Title: BEST child monitoring system ever!
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: After spending a small fortune on monitoring devices, intercoms to keep the communication and peace of mind for my young child transitioning into her own room, I decided to purchase this dropcam after reading many excellent reviews.  The install was a snap, I actually used the wall mount and mounted above her bedroom door to get a great view of her entire room.  My wireless connection through my home was intermittent and dropped frequently so I purchased strong repeater (wireless N) also on amazon and upon receipt and installation of that, I rarely ever drop the signal and when it does, it immediately re connects.  I log in from my iphone through out the day from work, when she's home with dad and can watch her playing, I can also hit the "talk" feature on my phone and am able to communicate clearly to her (there appears to be about a 5-10 second delay though she's now used to waiting a few seconds for me to respond before she continues her conversation), the microphone on the cam is very sensitive, it actually picks of conversations in nearby rooms of the home that can be heard when I log in remote from my desktop computer at work! If you have a nightlight in the room, the night vision option would not be necessary as it makes everything look like a scary movie, I chose to just view it through the night with the night vision setting turned off as you can clearly still see the images in the room, the mic is very good and even at the volume 1/4 of the available setting, I can still hear her breathing through the night...huge comfort for a paranoid mother that spent many nights up and down checking on her before this purchse.Best purchase of its kind, I highly recommend just remember you need a strong wireless connection or you may have to purchase a repeater.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: rodney dalton
Reviews.Content: Has some issues at sunset in a room with no lights on, since the motion sensor is based on optical properties, but a very good product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Elise
Reviews.Content: The set up was quick and easy.  We had the camera up and running in 60 seconds.  The resolution is great and the night vision works well.  I could monitor our dogs while I am at work and the two-way audio allows me to correct them when they are misbehaving.I chose the Dropcam over other wifi monitoring cameras because it does not require a computer to operate. The offsite DVR service is a great option for anyone who wishes to review footage.The phone app works well allowing for easy control of the camera.Overall this is a great camera and it is reasonably priced. I would highly recommend this to anyone who is considering getting one.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice, all things considered....
Reviews.Author: Garrett Family
Reviews.Content: Setup was pretty easy; liked that a lot . Even in low resolution, there is a few seconds delay. Not too much of a big deal. The mic is REALLY sensitive, but you can mute it if it's a problem.My biggest problem with that is when I'm on my laptop and have muted the microphone, it mutes ALL other sounds coming from my laptop. Likewise, if you turn the volume all the way down on the mic, it turns all sounds down on my computer. If it weren't for this annoyance, I would have given it 5 stars.UPDATE: Apparently, you can turn down the mic sensitivity (or off) under Settings. Rating updated. :)

Reviews.Title: Easy and clear
Reviews.Author: G. Larkin
Reviews.Content: This was extremely easy to set up.  Less than 3 minutes!  I have two one at each home. Provides piece of mind. As well as having a separate intrusion system

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture and Other Great Features; Only Some WiFi Drops Kept It from 5 Stars
Reviews.Author: J. M. Doloboff
Reviews.Content: This product is as advertised - easy set-up, excellent picture. night vision, two-way audio communication, compact and very reasonably priced.  My only issue has been that the camera sometimes drops the WiFi signal, and I need to set it up again - it doesn't always just reconnect itself when a signal is dropped and you can't reconnect it remotely.  I am hopeful that this issue will not frequently occur.Free for live viewing; $9.99 a month for a rolling 7-day history.  This camera makes baby monitors, as well as some very expensive CCTV systems, seem primitive.  And I love the iPhone and iPad apps that make it quick and easy to view my house from anywhere.Give the Dropcam a try.  My bet is that you will buy at least one more after trying the first one.

Reviews.Title: Average
Reviews.Author: chill
Reviews.Content: I tried several IP cams and settled on a Logitech model. The Dropcam was VERY simple to set up but the drawbacks for me were a smaller viewing angle and requiring a yearly payment for "cloud DVR" services. Without paying you cannot look at past events like you can with the Logitech which stores it on a SD card and on your computer. If these things don't bother you, this is a very good IP camera.

Reviews.Title: I love this cam
Reviews.Author: Jagger
Reviews.Content: I love this buy. The night-vision isn't great but the motion detector is AMAZING. A fly flew by & I was alerted on my cell that there was movement & I looked at the footage where movement was marked & saw a fly quickly move in front of the lenseInstall was incredibly easy & I am positive I will use the 7 day DVR feature ($99 a year)

Reviews.Title: Be careful - customer service poor, product unreliable
Reviews.Author: Robert Hornbeck
Reviews.Content: I initially had a good review on here for DC.  I own two of their cameras.  The results have been normally okay, with spotty on/off/ wifi coverage.  My wifi in the house is covered by two different routers and there are still some connectivity issues, though the units aren't that far away.  But what really bugs me is BOTH dropcams went off line this morning (Saturday).  They were connected to two different networks (which are operating fine).  I can not get either of them to reconnect - which is a hassle to access the remote cameras and now plug them back into the computer for reconfiguring.  BUT, the most frustrating thing is the Customer Support is NEVER there on the telephone.  I called today at 12:50 PM PDT and they say the offices/ phone are "closed."  Really?  Your website says you have tech support on Saturdays up till 6:00 PM PDT.  Just for info, I have NEVER been able to contact a rep on the phone (I must have tried 6 or 7 times in my early experience with these cameras, and they always said no tech available or words to that effect (inside their stated hours).The product is "sexy" but it just ain't there as far as reliability and support.
