I will search for a better camera at some point.  I have sunk the $150 for a years monitoring on these cameras, but not again.  They just are terrible on the support side.  Additionally, the Droid Ap is terrible in that you can only look back about 5 hours or so in history.  The PC ap is not very good either (very labor intensive to make a video clip via the sliding timeline.  The Ipad ap is good, but come on, us Droid users deserve quality too.  Very frustrating!

Reviews.Title: Good except it does not have real motion detection based recording
Reviews.Author: A. Batuk "MyWay"
Reviews.Content: I liked the camera overall. It is really easy to use and it does a good job except one crucial (well crucial for me at least) thing which is that it does not have motion based recording. The motion detection they are talking about in the description is that it shows you where there was motion on the recording. This way you can go back and check out what was happening where there was motion very easily.But it keeps recording and using your bandwidth, even when there is no motion, 24/7 as long as it is turned on. This is big for me. I do not like the idea of my internet bandwidth to be occupied unnecessarily like this. I would give it a 5 star if it had real motion detection based recording. I really hope that they will come up with a firmware update that will add motion detection based recording. Otherwise, I do not have much use for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: ejd "ejd"
Reviews.Content: It was easy to install and works wonderfully.  The images are clear and easy to view.  It definitely met our expectations and we are thinking of getting another one.Great app!

Reviews.Title: Its good, but...
Reviews.Author: Gregory Vandenham
Reviews.Content: We have just one problem with it.  During our trial period we had one thing happen in the house that we wanted to keep the video for.  We forgot to pay for the years service by the time the trial expired (they never sent any kind of renewal or purchase reminders) and the dvr footage was deleted without grace period.  We contacted them and sure enough, when you expire, so does your footage and there's no way to get it back.Other than this problem, we like the app for the iphone and android and it works just as advertised on their website.The black center slug (camera) does pop right out of the silver frame - so there's potential to change mounting options.Hope they'll have a version for exterior use.  Actually would love one that would be like a high end replacement porch light.

Reviews.Title: Great Product with EZ set up
Reviews.Author: R. Rossell "Computer Buddy"
Reviews.Content: This little cam was received quickly and set up was very easy.  Within 20 minutes it was up and running.  So far after one week of use, it is functioning perfectly.  Monitoring is only a couple of clicks away.  I tried another company's cam and could not get it to work, but this one rates five stars!!

Reviews.Title: Great  and Easy To set up...
Reviews.Author: G. Muzik
Reviews.Content: Was amazingly easy to set up...took all of 5 minutes....We ended up buying the DVR option for 7 days.  We use to to keep an eye on my 94 year old mother when no one is with her....It works great...no problems at all...have had it running for about three weeks now.  The talk feature is not really two way, but it does work....pretty quiet on the camera end, but that should be expected without some kind of powered speaker.

Reviews.Title: Front door is secure!
Reviews.Author: McKinney Dan
Reviews.Content: Very easy install and configuration and the app that's available on the iPad is amazing.  I have signed up for the cloud memory so in the event that there is a break-in I'll have backup video footage that can't be stolen or destroyed that I can provide to authorities.

Reviews.Title: Product was ok
Reviews.Author: Jedadiah P. Ashford
Reviews.Content: I had dropcam for less than a month. It was super simple to setup, mobile and web interface is probably the best. But the device NEVER worked with the two way audio. I tried to contact support but they only have an email, and it took days for responses. Finally they suggested to return it. I also started having video issues. Maybe I got a bad batch... I got the foscam instead. 50 bucks vs 150 and i can view from my mobile phone. Resolution and viewing angle arent as good, but not sure if its worth the extra 100 for this dropcam. I didnt think so.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what we needed
Reviews.Author: Brett Benegar
Reviews.Content: We wanted a camera to monitor an indoor location and provide us with a notification when there was movement. The camera had performed very well. I read a lot of reviews prior to purchasing the camera so I was watching for some the issues reported. The setup was pretty straight forward and easy, but I did have to attempt it twice, the first time it didn't complete. But after I restarted the process it worked well. I have had only one time when the camera disconnected after more than a week going 24/7, but after an hour or so it reconnected and continues to provide video as advertised. The camera does get warm, but the instructions warn you the camera can be hot. I don't think the heat is that bad and it doesn't appear to affect camera operation.One thing that would be useful is if there was a way to set a threshold of some kind on the motion detection, but it does have a filter so you only get one notification when there is multiple motion events in a short period of time.Bottom line is that I have bee pleased with this purchase and have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Clear HD and Wide Angle View with excellent cloud software monitoring
Reviews.Author: Ed Peterson
Reviews.Content: I received my Dropcam and tried to get working with my Macbook Air and would not search for the wireless servers in the area. I tried again on a Windows based machine and same result. I called and left emails to Dropcam Technical Support and and they shipped a second unit to me and and afterwards sent me a shipping label for return of the original system (the replacement Dropcam quickly received before shipping defective unit back to them). This was my discouraging experience with the system and a one star deduction however the customer service was extremely good. Now for the positive experience.The second Dropcam was received and I hooked it up to my Macbook Air and within a minute it found my airport express router and I entered my security code and then unplugged from my computer and attached to the 120 volt outlet with adapter. I then logged on to the Dropcam cloud service and the video and audio was working perfectly. I was pleasantly surprised since there have been so many problems reported with wireless monitoring systems (including other manufacturers) with the airport express wireless routers however this one worked fine without a need for any of the complicated looking workarounds I have seen on the web for this router. I am using Mountain Lion 10.8.2 with the latest software update on my airport express. I downloaded the dropcam software for my iPhone 4 and audio and video worked perfectly with the standard 3g network. During the first day of use I noticed several dropouts where the camera lost the signal. I used the suggested method of changing my channel on my 2.4 ghz router from channel 10 to channel 1 and for the past 3 days this has no longer been a problem and camera has been working great. The wide angle lens is a great feature for my purposes on this camera since I have a shallow field for view needed and can get more subject matter in the screen. The quality is outstanding however keep in mind as with any wide angle lens those items far away may be harder to identify. For my situation the best part of this system (other than not needing your computer on or additional hardware) is the cloud monitoring software. I can quickly watch from work on my iPhone or away on trips the live video and for the $99 a year have the 7 day recording with activities identified and easily reviewed. I know many reviewers have been disappointed with the service fee however I believe the value after experiencing the system features for me is worth the upgrade. I highly recommend this product however had to deduct one star for my original DOA first unit. Although this was extremely frustrating when I did get up and running with the replacement Dropcam I am extremely happy with the quick installation on my Mac system and cloud monitoring service.

Reviews.Title: Works as promised
Reviews.Author: Elaine A. Goldstone
Reviews.Content: I'm quite impressed with how simple this was to set up. Camera and stand are a little clumsy as the camera does come easily out of the stand but otherwise it's a great camera.  Sound is really good.  Playback works well.

Reviews.Title: Too much fun.
Reviews.Author: Marci Ann Rains
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I wish I could buy a few more, because the entertainment is certainly worth the price. Simple set up, small monthly fee for extra internet access features, and hours of laughing your butt off at the silly things your kids do when you're not  looking. The equipment has very sensitive monitors, so you catch everything.

Reviews.Title: Now an advocate
Reviews.Author: Gary Morgenstern
Reviews.Content: I placed a Dropcam in my vacation home. Installation took 5 minutes. The picture quality is excellent at all times of the day. And the microphone is also extremely sensitive. At times the motion detection is too sensitive and I get false alerts, but this is the best security investment I have ever made.

Reviews.Title: easy to set up, great customer service
Reviews.Author: D. Spiers "DAS"
Reviews.Content: It is easy to set up.  I had one unit go down on me and they replaced it quickly.Works as advertised.  Easy way to see home when traveling.Sound quality is not super. Software is great on the iPhone.  Although I wish they would stop using flash for the desktop app.But I would recommend it.  Have two units.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Yelena
Reviews.Content: I really like this product. It is quick, easy and works on my android phone! sound and pic is crystal clear. no complaints. and the cooles thing you can actually talk through it! For the price its a bargain!

Reviews.Title: Dropcam HD Wi-Fi Wireless Video Monitoring Camera
Reviews.Author: Dex Sanchez
Reviews.Content: great cam...easy to install, easy to operate, app and software is very easy to use. Picture quality was pretty good

Reviews.Title: So great!
Reviews.Author: scgal241
Reviews.Content: We got a Motorola baby monitor and then purchased this for a trip to hawaii.  Wow, this is so convenient!  SO easy to set up (only takes like 5 minutes, literally), and its ready to go.  I also love that you can look at it on ANY device (I have iphone, husband has droid).  I also love the notifications when there is movement, and that it has the ability to record, that way you can go back in time to see what happened while you weren't looking.  We used it as a nanny cam for a while it was so great.  We can check in on our little man while we were at work. love love love.  My only complaint is that it doesn't pan and zoom like my motorola, but if you set the camera in a corner far enough away so that you have the whole room in the shot it really doesn't matter.

Reviews.Title: Great office security camera
Reviews.Author: Christopher Beaugrand
Reviews.Content: I have this set up in the lobby of our office suite, pointed at the door.  We have purchased the add-on DVR service.  This is completely peace of mind as we had someone just walk in to our suite a few years ago and steal stuff from our conference room.  At least this way, we can the get building and the police a description if it happens again.

Reviews.Title: Pricey but excellent
Reviews.Author: P. Horne
Reviews.Content: After trying to set up a couple other cameras this is just a no-brainer – just join your network and you're done.  I consider that zero configuration.  The camera itself is just well-designed – easy to tilt forward and backward and rotate.  The video quality is good – it doesn't seem to be crystal-clear HD like I get from my iPhone but it's good enough.  I got the camera to watch my dog while I'm at work but it's also really nice to have the monitor available for things like deliveries, knowing if my roommates are home yet, watching the maids, etc. I also have a dog walker and it's easy for me to review what time he took the dogs out and what time he returned.The only bummer is the price – if this were $99 I'd say it's a perfect product. It's more than double the price of most IP cameras so it's extravagant but the easy set up for me was worth it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Security/Nanny Cam
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a Panasonic IP camera to use at my business. I am fairly tech savvy, but after 3 tries, I gave up on using it. It was complicated, requiring port forwarding and the image quality was not great once I could finally view it on their web browser which was very unsophisticated . So I tried the Dropcam, not expecting very much compared to the Panasonic camera, but what a big surprise ! It is extremely easy to set-up, extremely reliable, and the image quality and remote viewing software and brwser are excellent ! It works so well that I purchased another one to keep an eye on a vacation home. When they make an outdoor camera, I'll buy at least 5 more to replace the system I have now at my home.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for us computer illiterates!
Reviews.Author: M. Smith
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after having horrible luck with the D-Link brand.This is the first thing I have ever purchased that was as easy to set up as the company said it would be!I had this set up and running in no time.I can view it on my Andriod phone with no problem.  It even sends me alerts when the camera detects motion!This is a great camera at a great price!I am going to purchase 2 more in the near future, to cover my whole house!Finally, something that is easy to set up!!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Dima
Reviews.Content: after struggling with Linksys products for a while, I decided to give this one a try and I'm glad I did!  Set-up was a breeze, great video quality, apps for iPhone and iPad seem to be working just fine.

Reviews.Title: Good for monitoring your home
Reviews.Author: jaxmandue
Reviews.Content: The camera is good offering two quality levels to balance image and bandwidth. The software needs 2 critical upgrades - let me set a schedule for turning the camera on and off, and give me an option to only transmit when the motion sensor is triggered.  I am hopeful they will get those features and I ordered a second camera. I now will know whenever someone comes or goes from the house or garage...

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey T. Burton
Reviews.Content: This is an outstanding product for the price.  Image quality is wonderful and the feed is very fluid even over a standard smart-phone 3G connection.  Other camers have a high amount of lag with the motion and image quality is not very sharp.  Dropcam, especially for the price does not have those problems and set up was very fast and easy.  Connected to iPhone 4s, iPhone 5 and iPad 3 in minutes.  Works over cell signal or with wifi.  Camera is powered by USB cable that plugs in to computer or in to A/C wall adapter.  Optical zoom is decent, night vision is excellent within 10-12 feet and unit is very sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Great and easy
Reviews.Author: Mary Shopper "MA"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install. It emails when it detects movement, which is nice. A little difficult to see at night, but we just leave a light on. You can see my whole living room and dinning room with one camera. You can zoom in, though if you want to.

Reviews.Title: Quality control and quick response
Reviews.Author: MRB
Reviews.Content: I installed my first Dropcam and I was satisfied. Then I purchased the second Dropcam, but it arrived with a quality issue, the right-hand side of the picture was out of focus. After exchanging some messages with their customer support with no success, I had to return it to Amazon for exchange.P.S. Their customer support responded promptly after my posting of this message, and I am happy with their intent to remedy the issues.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam
Reviews.Author: DeeDee
Reviews.Content: I love my Dropcam? I turn it on every time I leave home. It's sensitive enough to pick up the yard guys when there outside mowing.  I like the peace of mind of being alerted when there's activity around my home and I don't have to pay an exorbitant amount for the service.

Reviews.Title: meh
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: I was fun for the first couple of weeks. The video is a little slow. The quality is pretty good and it's light.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: mmartin581
Reviews.Content: This product is quick and simple to setup.  It gives me the piece of mind I need while traveling, having the ability to easily connect from anywhere.  I can even have voice conversations through it.  I get emailed alerts whenever motion or voice (if activated) is detected.I use the free app on my iPhones and iPads.Awesome.

Reviews.Title: At first I wanted to name it: drop-out-cam, but now it's okay
Reviews.Author: Walter Lugten
Reviews.Content: When I opened the box I liked what I saw, a streamlined, very thought out and easy to install camera. That is what I thought. First I had problems connecting it to my Starbridge wireless network. After two days of unsuccesfull attempts I managed to connect it by linking a Linksys wireless router to my network. In the first days there were many drop-outs in the video recordings but the connection is stable now. The camera is positioned to overlook my backyard where my  two cars are parked. In daytime the images are very good. But in darkness the images become blurry and the faces unrecognizable. I will try if a better lllumination will solve this problem.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Great product, works well, easy to set up. Doesn't always send an alert to my phone when there is sound in the room though.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Denis Bernardinello
Reviews.Content: useful and great customer service  + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + thanks

Reviews.Title: Great camera for money
Reviews.Author: Gale
Reviews.Content: First day nieighbors car alarm went off 2 am. 2nd day my router kicked it offline and would drag and delay. Went out bought the net gear N900 router at Costco, problem solved works great now kids are happy because of PS 3 I have great Internet connection now iPads phones directv whole home. Don't be afraid to play around with the camera setting after you set it, I found out by turning off digital zoom I have a huge wide angle field of vision. I also have a street light at the end of my driveway, so I turned off the night vision feature(was on auto) and the picture is so much better and I can now see the neighbors car where as the night before I couldn't see across the street. I am buying two more for my pool and backyard, I will subscribe to the dvr service since I feel if you can't view the timeline of the camera it would be a wast

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Musashi
Reviews.Content: The Dropcam system is better than I thought it would be. All the reviews are correct. Easiest wireless camera I've ever installed. It's so good I bought two more!

Reviews.Title: Quick set up, nice quality of image
Reviews.Author: M. MAIA
Reviews.Content: Set up was super faster and simple. Image quality and infrared view are very good! The motion sensor even gets a small mosquito!!! Have to kill all the mosquitoesI'm satisfied, but not completely. Could give 2,5 stars but it's not possible, so I give it 3.The dropcam web site provides you a way to live view your camera and to view past events (If you opt for a digital recording plan).

Reviews.Title: Very easy
Reviews.Author: justin "debo6761"
Reviews.Content: I have used other monitors/ baby monitors, and spent countless hours on the phone with tech support.  The Dropcam is so easy to use and set up.  I highly recommend this to anyone for any reason.

Reviews.Title: Easy Breezy!
Reviews.Author: Damon Reeher
Reviews.Content: This thing was very easy to setup! I am very impressed with the ease of use and the dropcam website and apps they have to go along with it. I can view my camera from anywhere in the world and see whats going on when I'm not home. It has crystal clear images in HD! I also like that it has two way communication built in. If you are using it to monitor the inside of somewhere you can actually talk to the people through it from your phone or computer. Really nice product. The monthly fee was a bit hesitant for me but after the free trial I knew I had to have it so I could go back and watch anything that triggered the motion sensor or had an event alert. I love everything about it, only thing I would hope for in the future would be maybe a outdoor version. Also, the monthly fee for viewing the recorded video is per camera, I wish there was a better pricing option for adding multiple cameras, or maybe if they had a kit where you could purchase multiple cameras to run on one system for one fee it would be nice. Anyways, the camera as it is, is a great little wifi based security camera. Perfect for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Waaay better than expected
Reviews.Author: jeepgirl
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic device! I gave it as a gift to my boyfriend so he could keep an eye on his two dogs when he is away and having others care of them. The sad part is it exposed how poorly is dog watcher was caring for the dogs and all the "guests" that were coming and using his home as a party place for his friends! while the dogs sat in there pens for hours! So we were both happy to end that situation quickly and wouldn't have known without this great camera.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to set up picture quality during daytime is very good
Reviews.Author: Richard Callari "rich cal"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up, Picture quality is very good during the daytime the night vision could be better but it's okay

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Kris Schrempp
Reviews.Content: This is a Great little camera for anyone!! So easy to install and set up and has great clearity... You should by this if you are interested in protecting your home and family...

Reviews.Title: Buying another
Reviews.Author: Daniel L Oneil
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install and use.  I'm buying another.  In fact, I'm going to purchase the $9.95/month DVR service.  The 7 day free trail was great.The iPhone app is awesome...same for iPad.I got it set up to alert me when there is motion or sound detected.  You can make & save clips, share, them, email them...etc.Five stars

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jerseyhigg
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a dropcam and have decided to purchase a second because of my level of satisfaction so far. I have been researching and testing for just the right camera for my home, but none of the cameras that I have tested in the last few years fit my needs as well as this one. I am extremely pleased. The ease of use, including the initial set up, as well as the audio and video quality, including the low light capability, is exceptional for the cost and I believe, the best deal in home security cameras. I have been so impressed, I have been recommending these cameras to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Joshua L. Dewberry
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic.  It takes maybe 3minutes to set up and works right off the bat.Camera is very impressive quality and so is the night vision as well.  Also, the FREE app lets you see the public dropcams as well which helped in my decision to purchase.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam- good innovation
Reviews.Author: Eric "God's Child"
Reviews.Content: Pretty nice little gadget. Love the internet function- fun for family who lives out of town so they can watch baby. Has a few glitches at times, but what electronics dont?

Reviews.Title: Drop cam very easy set up
Reviews.Author: Sara Lang
Reviews.Content: Very easy set up.  I am running USB cord directly to USB hub at wireless router.  When I just plugged it in and went wireless, it kept losing signal.  Have not yet lost signal hooking directly to USB hub!

Reviews.Title: Just OK...for now
Reviews.Author: Zippy994
Reviews.Content: Dark brown couches and furniture appear bright purple.  Otherwise picture is just ok. Sound quality/speaker function is hit or miss.  Glitchy. Bought IZON for wife's Mac 1.5 years ago. With recent software update the IZON video quality is night and day compared to the Dropcam from the same room, same position.  Has some nice features. Probably need to play with it more to get the most out of it. Still nice to have on the fly when checking on the dogs from Android phone or netbook. Hoping for a software update soon.  Will buy more if bug fixes work out like they did for the IZON.

Reviews.Title: easy for anybody
Reviews.Author: lady lawyer "I love books"
Reviews.Content: If you can connect your smartphone to your home wi-fi, and know how to plug a usb cable into your computer, then you know how to set this up.  It took maybe five minutes to set up an account, connect to wi-fi, and have it working.  And that includes setting up the apps on my iPhone and iPad.  I love that now I can see for myself what is happening once the kids get home from school.  The alerts arrive promptly and the video is clear even on my phone's small screen.  The night vision works well and the sound quality and volume is more than adequate for my purposes.  I am planning on purchasing another for a different part of the house.

Reviews.Title: Great security camera
Reviews.Author: T PETRICCA "zephyr"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little security camera.  I have set in my front window and it's on 24/7.  Because everyone talks about the bandwidth, I don't have it set on HD.  It does get warm but not hot enough for me to be concerned about.  I put some black electrical tape over the lights for the night vision so it would not reflect off the window glass.  But I need to work on that some more.  I paid the yearly $99 for the 7 day recording as I use it at my cottage down on Cape Cod and I'm not there all the time.  Friends like to tune in when it snows.  Haven't had any problems with disconnection to speak of.  And even it you do loose your connection, it resets itself which is a great feature because as I said, I'm not there all the time.  It was worth the price.  Would like to buy another one for my main house if the price goes down.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Adam J Matthews
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing.  before getting it, if I needed to stream something I had to use my laptop all the time connected with a streaming server.  now in this all in one package I don't have to.

Reviews.Title: Easy install
Reviews.Author: Jerry Baker
Reviews.Content: No muss no fuss. This camera plugged in and linked up without any drama. resolution is good and motion sensor is very reliable. We have subscribed to their monitoring software. I had intended to use a free solution but find their solution pretty slick and worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Big Winner AND SO easy!
Reviews.Author: Myron Thornberry "MDT"
Reviews.Content: Even my 71 year old father figured this one out! His is thrilled with the camera and with the additional feeling of security this offers.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam
Reviews.Author: oldepossum
Reviews.Content: Sent it back runs very very hot. Not a good choice for me to use inside my house. Outside would be ok, but the unit is an inside only. Picture good the zoom is really nice. Easy to turn on from android or windows. No way yet to allow the feed to be recorded directly to the computer or phone. The feed must go first to the internet then back. Makes for a lag in the audio an video. Easy to set up.  Good  camera just too hot for me, so I got out of the kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely perfect. IMPRESSIVE
Reviews.Author: Karen Bachman
Reviews.Content: GREAT QUALITY.GREAT SIMPLICITY.GREAT PRICE.AMAZING. VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE. IN FACT, WILL  LIKELY BUY MORE.Dropcam, if you're reading this, PLEASE create an outdoor version. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: click
Reviews.Content: I had previously reviewed this item and gave it 2 stars , I did that because I had some issues. after using the dropcam and working with support realizing the issues were on my end. I was able to work all these problems out by myself . I have 2 of these cameras running and I must say they are pretty much flawless compared to even my panosonic cameras that cost me $600.00 each or more. The dropcam captures video 24/7 and doesn't miss anything . My Panasonic camera you have to hope the motion sensor detects it and if you set sensitivity up to high it records constant and clogs up your hard drive . Dropcam records to their server. I love these cameras , cant wait to see what this company comes up with in the near future ..

Reviews.Title: The Dropcam is Brilliant
Reviews.Author: Dawn C.
Reviews.Content: I just have to say I love this little cam. I am currently using it as a baby monitor with the Dropcam iPhone app. You have to create an account through Dropcam.com(creating the account itself is free) and log-in with a user name and password if you want to see the video from either an iPhone or computer. (I know it has Android compatibility too but I haven't seen the app for the Android so I can't comment.) They do let you try out the DVR service for the first week but then you have to pay a monthly fee for this service or you can just watch the video live. I have noticed a slight delay on my Dropcam but I'm not sure if that is the case for all Dropcam users. I would say it's between 5 & 10 seconds, hardly noticeable at all. You can talk through the app into the camera (by pressing the "talk" button) and you can hear audio which seems pretty clear. I haven't noticed any lag on the video. You can login from any computer with internet access to watch the Dropcam. If you set the preferences the App will alert you on your iPhone every time there is movement.  The Dropcam is highly durable, I know this because I have unfortunately dropped it on the hardwood floor and it still works very well with no cracks or anything. Also you can remove the dropcam from it's base, it is probably not much bigger than a golf ball and not too difficult to hide if you are a creative person. This is a very good, reliable camera and probably one of the best that I have tried out. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: A Must Have!
Reviews.Author: Heather McIntosh
Reviews.Content: We purchased this product to watch our house while we are away at work.. and our teenage child.  After two days of having this set up we saw a lot of things that we were not aware of.  Our teenage child is not aware of the camera in our living room, but lets just say she is grounded for life.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to monitor my dogs while I'm at work. It definitely does the job. And I love the 2-way radio! I am very impressed with the software available...you can view your camera anywhere (on your phone or computer)

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: michael allen
Reviews.Content: It was easy to setup and run plus the fact that it stores in the cloud means less space taking bulky equipment. The downside is it doesnt do night vision well and if you have metered internet access 50mbs a month might kill you

Reviews.Title: Just bought one and can't wait to get another
Reviews.Author: Marcus P
Reviews.Content: Got this for the front door.Here's the positives of the Dropcam...1) Wireless in the sense that it connects to WIFI2) 720P HD Video3) 7 days of video storage ($9.95/mo)4) Email/Text notifications on movement5) Two way audioCouldn't be happier with this... now gonna get one for the back door.

Reviews.Title: Recommended product- easy to use-easy to set up
Reviews.Author: John Codiglia
Reviews.Content: easy to set up, easy to use. For a relatively inexpensive home security product, it provides a visual view of the environment and it alerts you to any activity when you're not home. Purchased additional units for family members.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam works great!
Reviews.Author: Brian Lum
Reviews.Content: I bought this ip camera because all of it's reviews and being one of the only true HD ip cameras out in the market today.  Very easy to set up compared to other ip cameras.  With other ip cameras I simply just gave up and pretty much gave the cameras away.  It's pretty much a plug and play camera.  THe videos are really clear at 720p.

Reviews.Title: Great product, easy to use!
Reviews.Author: bella999
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, so easy to set up with your wireless internet.  I was up a running in 5 minutes.  I even brought it with us on vacation to watch our dogs at our rental cottage.  The app on my phone was free.  Very simple/clear instructions.  I recommend this to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great camera with very easy setup
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey B.
Reviews.Content: I am not most the computer savvy person, but it really is easy to get this camera up and running like other reviews have indicated.  In 10 minutes from the time I opened up the package, signed into my computer, synced up the camera and decided where I wanted to place it, I was done.  The App for my Iphone 5 works great and it works fine on my wife's Iphone 4S.  Great picture quality and sound.  I give it 4 stars because you can only use the camera inside and I find there is about a 3 second lag on the video.  Other than those two things this camera for the money is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Carl Braun
Reviews.Content: REally like the DropCam. It's pricier than the competition and you do have to buy a subsccription if you want enhanced services ($15 mo) but it works awesome. Very sensitive. Will send you an email when your lights turn on and off each day. You can watch and HEAR everything going on in your home real time. Good investment.

Reviews.Title: great image quality and fast uploading speed through wireless router
Reviews.Author: Vincent Jia
Reviews.Content: I bought Foscam FI8910W but had to return it due to its slowness through wireless router. DropCam HD is great in both image quality and its speed.

Reviews.Title: Great baby monitor option
Reviews.Author: J Andrew Romes
Reviews.Content: Works very well as a baby monitor, especially when it connects to my Android phone over my home wi fi

Reviews.Title: Easiest setup ever
Reviews.Author: Dana L Crowell
Reviews.Content: After owning 8 of the Cisco WVC80N Internet cameras and running the set up software upwards of 100 times to try and keep them going, this setup time of less than a minute was absolutely heavenly.  The  ease of setup was EXACTLY as described.  What a fresh idea...  Making something work  like it advertised to do!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: michael j riley
Reviews.Content: Fantastic. we finally found a product that works! We were able to access via 3G from iphone in a foreign country.

Reviews.Title: SUPER SIMPLE SETUP AND SHARP PICTURE
Reviews.Author: michael diaz
Reviews.Content: I've been looking for a wireless system for years and this is the one I choose. I've just installed it and have been viewing it on my IPhone and IPad and MacBook. All have crystal clear images with normal indoor lighting.Wide angle takes in everything I need to monitor and the zoom feature is pretty cool.The features are accessible and controllable from all my devices.This is an affordable solution to remote monitoring.I would buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: P. Graham "Tech Junkie"
Reviews.Content: This is a great device.  Super easy to setup and use.  The monthly service charge is a bit expensive... Especially if you have more than one camera so I don't sign up for the service and just use the basic functions which work great.  I hope they make a PTZ version and an outdoor version soon (which should be PoE and not wireless)

Reviews.Title: A dream come true- so far
Reviews.Author: Jay Wimer "Jaybawb"
Reviews.Content: This is for the Dropcam HD Wi-Fi Wireless Video Monitoring Camera.I just received my Dropcam this afternoon, and with much anticipation and trepidation, opened the box and installed it in about ten minutes. I've been burned many times by webcams. I use them to show what's going on at my web site and store. Most of them are garbage. Streaming video with clear resolution and SOUND  for under $1,000.00 is awesome. This one not only  installs easily, but it does everything I want it to do. Coupled with my Android as a hot-spot, it should prove to be as portable as I could wish for. I just ordered another one. I'm that impressed with it.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Rocks!
Reviews.Author: Brian "Monbri"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product to be able to monitor a rescue dog that we got just to make sure he was doing okay during the day. This product ROCKS! It literally took less than 2 minutes to set up and we were online. The set up was as simple as it can get. Open box, plug camera into a computer for the initial set up and username/password and that is it. This camera can be used for some many different reasons so much so that I ordered a second one for my parents home to keep an eye on my elderly father.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: QTY PYE
Reviews.Content: We really like this camera.  The interaction of motions, sounds, night cam, audio two way is awesome.  The camera gets really really really hot when in use, definitely keep it from arms reach from the little ones or from falling on your infant.

Reviews.Title: Night vision and software weak
Reviews.Author: Jerry Rappaport
Reviews.Content: While this camera is priced well, it's night vision feature is fairly weak making it hard to discern images. We also experience frequent outages of the transmission getting software/app error messages that the Dropcam is offline.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, obviously uses lots of bandwidth
Reviews.Author: Evan
Reviews.Content: We have this set up to monitor a turtle aquarium, and it works great, especially the night cam.  Easy to set up, great picture quality & motion detection, plus the DVR subscription is reasonably priced, however we had to turn that off, and set it to standard def, as we have a terrible broadband connection that is limited to 15GB up/down combined a month.  Can't wait to change so we can get it back to running full-steam.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam, I will get a couple more for sure.
Reviews.Author: Victor Servin
Reviews.Content: The installation was a breeze, really fast and simple. The image quality is great on all devices. The alerts & notification features are great, with the only  downside of being to sensible so a change in lighting triggers it (imagine cars from outside illumination the room)I would only add a weather proof version and this will be perfect !!

Reviews.Title: Dropcam review
Reviews.Author: Will Staples
Reviews.Content: Easy to install- functions as advertised- would like to see the price come down so I could purchase a couple more.

Reviews.Title: WITHOUT A DOUBT THE BEST OUT THERE
Reviews.Author: CL
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up.  You can see your live video within minutes.  The quality is really good, and it has a lag of just a couple of seconds.  I want to buy another one for a second room!

Reviews.Title: Puppy Cam
Reviews.Author: K. Noto
Reviews.Content: Incredibly easy to set up. Quality resolution. Fantastic App functionality. The talk-to function is fun to check in on my pup when we're out of town.My only gripe is that is is kind of expensive for such a small consumer electronic.

Reviews.Title: Great and easy to use but runs really hot!
Reviews.Author: sfbadvr
Reviews.Content: The dropcam is very easy to set up and to use. Viewing on the web and on our phones is easy to do and with great picture quality, even at night. I also like how I can move it around and it reliably comes back on line quickly. The only thing that I don't like and what makes me nervous about using it is how hot the camera runs. When you touch the camera the heat it generates does not burn, you but it is hot enough that you cannot touch it for very long. We have used it for 6 months now and it seems stable but I worry that the heat it generates implies that it can be a fire hazard.

Reviews.Title: Can't watch my baby room form my office computer
Reviews.Author: Poohbear
Reviews.Content: Works great for my iphon, but the real reason I bought it was to see my wife and baby at home from my office PC, but the webpage only shows a picture that gets stuck. Dropcam was not able to help... to bad.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Cat Lover
Reviews.Content: This product exceeded my expectations!  The set up took about 5 minutes (I had to go through the set up process twice because it didn't work the first time.  Second time went fine and still total time was 5 minutes!).  The picture is very clear and I can hear sound too.  Gives me peace of mind to be able to monitor my home remotely.  The price is great for the quality too.  I definitely will be recommending this product to my friends and family!

Reviews.Title: Runs Extremely Hot
Reviews.Author: Scott Manley
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to like the Dropcam.  I'm very excited about the overall premise and offering but the camera signal constantly dropped and the camera itself ran very hot.  At least 2-3 times a day I'd get the "dropcam went offline" message and not be able to see anything.  That, however was not a deal breaker for me.  I could not believe how hot the camera got after being plugged in for 5 minutes.  It was to the point where I did not feel safe having it on in our baby's room or any other room in the house for fear of catching on fire.  Hence, I stopped using it.  Maybe I had a bad camera or maybe not.  I have no issues with my other ip camera.

Reviews.Title: Great product great app
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Knight "Rick"
Reviews.Content: They just redid the app on apple for this. Looks great on a iPad or I phone now. Before it was just the iPhone app. Works well with high speed Internet.  Not seeing any slow downs on other wireless products. I plan to get 2 more of these.

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: Mark Huey
Reviews.Content: There is no better solution for a low cost alternative for home or office security.  The photo quality is excellent, even in low light.  The cost for Cloud recording is very reasonable, maybe even cheap!

Reviews.Title: wanted to like it......but disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Kelly Riker
Reviews.Content: This device was easy to set up and install. For that I give it 2 thumbs up. But everything went downhill from there. After about a week of use, the 2-way audio on this device stopped working. Neither side could hear anything much less use the talk feature. And when I would logged on through my iphone app it would always say there was no internet connection when there clearly was! And when it was working it would lose connection most of the time. Awful. Just awful.I bought this device on Cyber Monday so I paid half the listed price but certainly the hassle wasn't worth the discount. After reading rave reviews from those who liked this product, I think my unit was just defective. So I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Video delay and terrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: This is my first review on Amazon and I have ordered dozens of products before. My experience with dropcam has not been good at all. For starters, their customer service is terrible. It takes hours to get a hold of anyone and all that person can do is escalate your situation to the so called "tier 2" level of support. I was told I would receive a call back and I never did.The worst part about dropcam is the delay in live viewing. The cameras would work fine for about 10-15 minutes and then they would buffer ... After returning back to live view the time would roll back anywhere from 20-30 minutes so your no longer getting a live view.I tried 3 different routers, adjusted every setting known to mankind (we have 50megs down and 5megs up) yet no luck. I am returning the cameras tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: quality
Reviews.Author: lee rimasfski
Reviews.Content: camera for the price functioned well for home security use and even with 1.5 m internet speed it worked well with simple setup and ease of use . the night vision was adequate and i would recommend this to others

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Rm
Reviews.Content: After researching several cams i was hesitant to purchase any due to bad reviews of most.  I decided to get the Dropcam and take a chance.  It was simple to hookup and works great!  Best choice if you just want a camera to use via your phone.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Kel
Reviews.Content: Between my father and I we own 10.  Works great, only wish they would come out with an outdoor model.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera and service!  Exactly what I was looking for and extremely easy to set and and use.  I'll be buying more of these in the very near future!

Reviews.Title: Finally able to keep an eye on my kids....... :)
Reviews.Author: Stewart Latona
Reviews.Content: I have been managing my online job fairly well, but then I realized that I may need something to monitor the kids while the house help was away. I browsed the internet and found the wireless video cam from Dropcam. This was pretty convenient too as you could stream video images from it not only through the computer, it can be compatible with other devices such as smartphones too; you just have to have Wi-Fi connection. It also sends prompt alerts and it is user-friendly as well. I think the most wonderful feature of this product is its night vision feature. I have spent money on several products which I have used before, but they weren't able to compare with this one. It has been very useful for me, I bet it would be for everyone who decide to use it too. Go get it!

Reviews.Title: Dropcam Wireless Video Monitoring Camera
Reviews.Author: JEFF SMITH "Jeff Smith"
Reviews.Content: It took a little time to figure some undefined setup issues but after the 3rd try it was working.Had trouble hooking up to the web but once on line everything with extremely well in setting up.The definition on the screen of details, people, facial features, and such is a little wanting. But,when you realize this whole thing cost less than $180 it is amazing. Plus the monthly/annual fees.It is pretty darn reasonable. Planning to get a second one for the back of house to cover it all.

Reviews.Title: Love Love the Drop Cam
Reviews.Author: Mary DeLisa
Reviews.Content: I have only had it for 3 weeks but I love how easy the drop cam was to install.  It is easy to monitor private vs public.  The only con I can think of is that it is gets hot, there is about a 10 second delay, and it must not have a quick refresh as quick movements look blurry.  But overall I love it, i would buy again and recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam review
Reviews.Author: Book worm
Reviews.Content: Wow, this is so very easy to set up and use. It has great picture quality . The night vision has a halo on the screenAnd has a 25 ft range. The speaker also is very weak. Not really usable. But the notice it sends is great just turn it off when you are not using it for security.  I don't mind paying for the record option. Other home security companies charge 40 plus/mo. And contract and city license. Overall I am impressed and will recommend this product to friends.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Hector J Perez
Reviews.Content: it is a great camera, not only i like thr picture quality but also the free app for the iphone n the ability to control it wihtout the need of a pc!!

Reviews.Title: Truly plug and play
Reviews.Author: Retreadfred
Reviews.Content: For personal use this cam is as advertised. It,s good in low light and announces any movement in the covered area.Works on my ipad and i phone from about anywhere there is wifi

Reviews.Title: Dropcam 5 stars
Reviews.Author: Charles P Gellman
Reviews.Content: I never do a review but this is a must due to the simplicity of the product.  Easy to use, viewing enabled via computer/mobile with little effort and video/sound alerts given via text message.Overall a great product at a minimal cost to make sure the house is safe and baby is ok sleeping while Mommy is in the other room.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup., good quality as described
Reviews.Author: Wei Ting Chen
Reviews.Content: I got this for the incoming baby as most of our family is out of town. the quality of the picture is great, the setup and extremely easy and the fact that you can watch the video over mobile devices is just fantastic.Love love love it.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam - Baby Monitor  - Best option
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: I bought this product less than a week ago. Received it today, installed in 5 minutes with very little efforts and it works very well. So far I strongly recommend the product. It has all the features announced, great image, easy setup...If you need a baby monitor, that is for sure the best option.

Reviews.Title: Great price and easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Diana Mendoza
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to keep an eye on my dog.  It was easy to install.  It's great!  It picks up a wide enough range of the room and you can hear everything going on.  It's easy to log in from anywhere there is a computer.  I also like that I can turn it on and off remotely.  I'll probably buy another one for the downstairs family room.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera, Easy Setup
Reviews.Author: M. Esget
Reviews.Content: I bought this to have increased awareness of when someone arrived at my front door.  When music is going or I'm upstairs, I don't always know when there is a knock at my door. The setup was extremely easy, under three minutes. Now I get notifications on my iPad and iPod touch when movement is triggered, which is very handy.The event tracking for the camera is nice, I can see a history of events and a short animated thumbnail of the motion to decide whether it's worth selecting to watch the full event. It's great for reviewing visitors when I've been away.Also, I did take the software update that reduced the bandwidth consumed by the device by enabling an SD video option. I do use the SD option and the fidelity of the video is fine for daily use.I like it enough that I'm considering ordering a second one as a Christmas gift for my friend and would easily recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Best deal on video monitoring
Reviews.Author: hokingchan
Reviews.Content: Ever since learning that my wife is pregnant, I've been on the search for a baby monitoring system. All those baby monitoring systems are complete crap, they all are low quality made, crappy screen resolutions and closed loop (meaning they only work wireless in house and on their own hardware).With this dropcam, it was super easy to setup, it was wireless, best of all, I get awesome viewing resolution on my own electronic device (iPhone, iPad). I can put this camera anywhere in my house. I can relocate it anywhere I want without hassle. Best of all, the software provided allows me to view up to 4 cameras at once.I'm not home most of the day for work, and this allows me to monitor the house and baby anytime I want, I can login with my iPhone and iPad, even on my desktop computer via any web browser, and POW! instant satisfaction.Love it!

Reviews.Title: awesome device
Reviews.Author: Matt "Matt"
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up just running through the wizard. Great resolution and feature set. Will be buying more and would recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Charles P. Allardyce
Reviews.Content: Love this camera so easy to setup.  This thing is so much easier than a Swann camera I bought after we were broken into a few weeks ago.  I can see my whole living room and the picture is very clear.  Motion detection is great and i get messages on my phone when it detects any motion or sound.  We feel so much better being able to watch our home when we are away.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Karen A. Harvey "Karen"
Reviews.Content: I'm using this camera in my babies room as a monitor and it is GREAT! I can talk to him to settle him down and when the babysitter is watching him the app on my phone lets be know when movement is sensed in his room so I can watch him sleep in his crib. Well worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Great stuff
Reviews.Author: T H Lim
Reviews.Content: The dropcam is easy to install. It's small and would not take up space. It also allow us to communicate using the camera as it has two way audio talk back

Reviews.Title: Love my Dropcam
Reviews.Author: CHARLIETURTLE
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying that I love my Dropcam. I have had the same disconnect problem that many others have. If you need a 100% reliable camera, I would purchase a hardwired cam. You need a fast a strong WiFi signal. That being said, this is a lovely camera that has nice fit and finish. The online application is clean and easy to navigate. I also love the iPhone app. I do wish the dvr subscription was cheaper, but I am glad its optional.

Reviews.Title: This is perfect for Alzheimer's patient.
Reviews.Author: Susangs
Reviews.Content: My husband has Alzheimer's, so this product gives my children and I peace of mind. It's as easy as you said to set up. I liked it so much I bought my best friend one because her husband has Alzheimer's to and she said it was the best present she ever got.

Reviews.Title: Bang for Buck
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: For the price the quality and features cannot be beat. Would highly recommend for the average person or even small business. The mobile apps work really well for general surveillance and security.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Bader
Reviews.Content: This is the best wireless camera I have ever used in my life, very simple to configure and install, it's small and flexible so that the user can keep it anywhere he/he likes, I defenitly recommend people to buy this cam

Reviews.Title: Simple and effective
Reviews.Author: RevKev
Reviews.Content: This was so simple to set up and works great. The offsite video recording is a fantastic feature for security.

Reviews.Title: Terrific product and service
Reviews.Author: T. J. Dunnigan
Reviews.Content: I bought the Dropcam to monitor the front door to a suite of offices. Seeing how well it works, I've now ordered one for home security.Set-up took less than ten minutes. The camera is well labelled so one can find the micro-usb port easily. Unbox, plug the provided USB cable into the camera and computer, click on the icon and step-through the web-based program for configuration. (One need not load any program on one's computer.) Choose one's wifi network, enter the password and it works.The video quality is excellent. One can view the live feed (and share with others) through one's web-browser. The delay in video feed is less than 5 seconds. One can also control the camera through the browser window: turning-off audio feeds, changing camera orientation, turning the status light off. Motion or sound events are noted on the video time-line and by clicking on any of these event markers one can view the video feed from that time.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitoring Camera
Reviews.Author: Tallpilot
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to set up.  Video resolution is ok but not great.  Night mode works well out to about 40 feet.  What separates this from the other monitors is the secure web site that will allow you to see a history of recordings. You can select "events" (sound or motion) to view from anywhere.  I can monitor my home from my iPhone, iPad or any computer. Viewing the web history will cost you about $99 per year for the first camera and $49 per year for subsequent cameras.  If you want to just view from your local wi-fi area there is no charge.  I liked the camera so much that I ordered a second one.  I had the opportunity to use their customer support twice and it is great.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Seg1218
Reviews.Content: The dropcam works as advertised. The zoom feature is limited to five areas of the in-zoom picture. Center and the four quadrants. The picture is clear but you have little control with this and no pan feature at all.The wireless set up is very easy but if you lose the wifi signal you should not expect it to reconnect automatically as advertised. Sometimes, yes. Always?  No.Good value just know what to expect.

Reviews.Title: Easiest way to secure your home
Reviews.Author: Vinay Kudithipudi
Reviews.Content: I got a dropcam after our house got broken into. And the only thing I can say is that I wish, I did it earlier.The installation and web interface are so easy to use that anyone can set it up.I love the instant motion and sound alerts.One of the must have tools in securing your property.

Reviews.Title: Easy and dependable
Reviews.Author: Ralph Robinson
Reviews.Content: After fumbling with my old Panasonic webcam, and eventually giving up on it, I purchased a Dropcam in the hopes of it being easy and simple to use.  It was.  Within minutes, I was up and running.  We use it to keep an eye on our two aging springer spaniels, now 13.  Checking in on them with my iPhone is a snap.  It is particularly enjoyable to use when I am out on the road, in my hotel room, and my girlfriend happens to be feeding them, or giving them a pat on the head.  The fact that you can hear the sounds and speak through the camera as well is a plus.  Our sneaky fun - waking up the dogs in the middle of a nap with a shout of their names!  Bottom line - Dropcam is a great value, and as far as I can tell, foolproof.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Bo Ray
Reviews.Content: Very few things do I buy that I'm 100% happy with but the Dropcam is one of those things. The set up is incredibly simple and the iPhone app is great too. I now have 4 of these. I have two at home and two at my wife's office. I can constantly monitor what is going on at both places either on my home computer or on my iPhone. This is the best product of it's type out there.

Reviews.Title: Best thing ever!
Reviews.Author: LP
Reviews.Content: This is wonderful! You can see your child and even interact with them from anywhere. Such a quality product. I bought this for my daughter to use and she wants another one.  She wanted it instead of the traditional monitor whose batteries are always needing charged and you have to carry a piece with you.  Now she just uses her phone. A lot less to hassle with.

Reviews.Title: Best Product Ever
Reviews.Author: Keisha S. Lyle
Reviews.Content: I originally saw this item on The Ricki Lake show.  The item was very easy to install on the computer.  I have a two story livingroom that leads to the kitchen.  So I placed the camera on the balcony allowing me to see the entire livingroom and half of the kitchen.  I downloaded the App on my Android phone and tested it out with my husband, his voice sounded clear and the picture was clear as well.  When communicating on your phone, make sure to hit the "Go Live" button and then make sure to hit the "talk" button, your voice can be heard from the speakers on the camera.  I love the fact that both my husband and I can see the kids on our separate Android phones.  This piece of technology has made life a whole lot easier for a mom that may be stuck in traffic for a few minutes, at least I can now see and speak to my kids and let them know my whereabouts. And let's not forget the added bonus of being able to hear how a sitter speaks to your kids when you are not around.  Lastly, it acts as a home security system because you can send an alert to your phone whenever there is movement in your home (I haven't done that as of yet).

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: SNAKE89144
Reviews.Content: I have had this DropCam product installed in my home for almost one year now.  Since I live overseas, it's a great way to check up on the status of my home and make sure everything is OK while I am gone.  It is an excellent product.  The cool thing about it is that I can monitor the inside of my home day and night 24/7, and if there is a big noise or movement, I get an email on my business and personal email account telling me something happened.  I have an APP installed on my IPOD TOUCH so that I can immediately log onto the DropCam website and look inside my home and listen too.Love it!

Reviews.Title: Second one: A good product for the category
Reviews.Author: K9Unit
Reviews.Content: I bought one for a relative's house and found it to be very easy to use and of good quality. I decided to buy one for myself. The 2-week free trial automatically activated once you linked it to an account. I wish this is not the case as I would like to use that 2 weeks at a time when I truly need it. But I guess that is not their objective.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, reliable product, poor customer support.
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: The item is very easy to install and use.  It's a bit larger than expected, but is of good quality construction.  You'll need to install it near a power outlet.  The set-up is very easy.The video quality is fair.  There's quite a lag (5 -10 seconds) between the real time and the transfer, and the sound option takes longer.  The color is very skewed, if that matters to you.  Browns and greens are usually purple and pink through mine.The iPhone app and website run smoothly, as well.The customer support was quite poor.  Firstly, the item didn't ship until a week after I ordered it.  When requested to explain the delay, they stated they would "over-night" the product to me, which they didn't.  They then sent the item "Fed Ex Ground", which took every bit of 10 days to receive.This is a good product, and if you order it now, you might have it by 2013.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Rob Parker "Yld2rob"
Reviews.Content: Tried many cameras. Disappointed in all of them except Dropcam. I just ordered my second one! Without spending hundreds more, this is it. Also love the cloud DVR feature.

Reviews.Title: dead simple to setup, great packaging, great product design
Reviews.Author: Matthew S. Havener
Reviews.Content: This product is incredibly well designed and manufactured. They really paid attention to every detail. Setting up for computer, iPhone and iPod touch monitor was really easy, and I've never had a problem connecting. Wish there was an iPad app, but it runs the iPhone version of the app just fine.

Reviews.Title: DropCam ... Good Idea That Needs Grooming
Reviews.Author: D. C. Balducci "Professional"
Reviews.Content: Good Camera with limitations that are NOT spelled out in the literature.If you have a typical home network on either a MAC or PC system this product should work just fine. The picture quality is not HD (ahem) as suggested in the name, but perfectly adequate. It is quite attractive and disappears if placed effectively. It was a snap to set up and sign on to my MAC Airport Extreme based home network using their sign-on screen with just my password.  DropCam online web access was also a snap to set up.However, a 'WPA Enterprise' secure wi-fi systems like we have at work requires BOTH a username and password, while the drop cam only provides an opportunity to insert a password. I discussed this unfortunate surprise with the support people at Dropcam and they affirmed that their present design will not get you connected to a WPA Enterprise wi-fi network. For me this was an unexpected shortcoming.Otherwise I would rate this product with four stars, and I would grant an additional fifth star if the product fulfilled true HD picture quality as suggested in the name  Dropcam HD. Dropcam HD Wi-Fi Wireless Video Monitoring Camera

Reviews.Title: Underwhelmed
Reviews.Author: Eric Simpson "esimpson1"
Reviews.Content: I was drawn to this product because it claimed 720P HD quality.  I've not found this to be the case.  It's very blocky looking when seen on a large screen.  There is also quite a serious delay between "real time" and seeing the video.I do wish I could use PC based software as my DVR.  While it's great that DropCam uses supposedly good security, I'm not sure I want to rely on that.  What if the company goes out of business, they get hacked, or there's some glitch and it can't record.  I'd rather keep the video on my local network, going to my PC (which is on 24/7.)I'll also say that setup was very easy.  It's better than some cams that only do 640x480, but not quite what I expected.  The speaker is kind of cheesy but 2-way communication is still kind of neat.  The mic isn't the best, either and sound quality leaves a lot to be desired.I guess it comes down to "What do you expect for $149?"  I guess not much.  It works, it does what it says.

Reviews.Title: plug and play perfect
Reviews.Author: Gerald Berke "gberke"
Reviews.Content: Instantly and easily installed and operational, excellent quality...I have one, hardly sure how I'll use it, but over time I'm sure it will be more and more useful, looking out the front door, seeing what the snow looks like, checking the house while I'm away, watching the kitty, a bird nest...  with the addition of capturing plus motion and sound alerts, it's an excellent product.

Reviews.Title: Everything works good!
Reviews.Author: Milenko Strika
Reviews.Content: Setup was easy and without any problems.Cameras installation was quick and quality is great (I got two cameras)!iPhone app works great and you can switch them off remotely.DVR interface looks clean and easy to use.I would give 5 stars if:- DVR plan would offer better pricing- There would be better zoom handling (iPhone native with two fingers)- Ipad application would exist- Setup would be without a computerThese are my things for great DropCam team to consider for the future development.

Reviews.Title: Using the Dropcam
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I have setup and used the dropcam for about a month now.  The high resolution picture is very good. The audio is good.  The software is also very good.  I have an IPhone and had it up and working within minutes.  The only thing I would like is to be able to use it with my own DVR software that allows me to have remote web cams and record them.  I need the video and audio ports that are used by it.  If anyone knows let me know.  The setup is quick and easy.  Their DVR feature is nice for people that don't have any means of recording themselves.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with the Dropcam
Reviews.Author: Sydney Foster
Reviews.Content: We have been using our Dropcam as a video baby monitor for a few weeks now, and we love the product. It was extremely easy and quick to set up -- like less than 10 minutes. The picture and sound qualities are excellent, both online and via the phone app. We're thinking of purchasing several more as home monitoring devices.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional, in every way!
Reviews.Author: Robert Wood
Reviews.Content: I've been operating my first Dropcam for 3 days now, and I have to say, I am blown away by the ease of installation, the camera's performance, and how beautifully and intelligently thought-out the monitoring software/interface is.Installation could not have been easier. It only took about 5 minutes before I was viewing images, on-line. It synced with my wifi router, without hesitation or hiccup.The image, and sound quality exceeded my expectations, even in the dark.I view the camera images, access my account, and adjust settings from my Windows PC, my iPad, and my iPhone.This first camera was a 'test case', so I could determine how good the Dropcam system was. I now plan to get 3-4 more, to cover the rest of my house.The only thing I can ask for, Dropcam, is please design an outdoor/weather-proof version, so I can mount one outside my front door!One recommendation for Dropcam:- you must establish an accessories store (think Apple). There needs to be a place to order spare cables, of varying lengths. Not all applications require 10 feet or so of power cable. I would love to order shorter cables. Also spare power adapters, mounting plates.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: Rick "coloradoricky"
Reviews.Content: I have owned the camera for about a month and it is used to monitor inside a vacation home.  The setup was painless and the interface simple to use, both on Macs and iPad/phone apps.  Clarity of picture is good; sound somewhat less so but acceptable.  Haven't had any problems with it stopping or losing the wifi signal as others have mentioned.  Does what I expected.

Reviews.Title: So Far Works Great!
Reviews.Author: bikeka
Reviews.Content: Had this for about a week now and I love it! Love the text and email motion alerts. Picture is clear. Even the sound is good. The only thing I don't like is that the unit does get hot. I suppose its OK though. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Steveo
Reviews.Content: I purchased three weeks ago and so far so good.  I had a few disconnects but have now Hooked up timers on my router and camera to reboot daily automatically and no disconnects since.  Picture quality is decent for the money.

Reviews.Title: Like It!
Reviews.Author: Paul J.
Reviews.Content: I bought a different camera last year which was very difficult to set up. I tried to get it going on a PC and a Mac, but you need to be an IT person to configure those other cameras, and never did get to view it on a website. I was only able to watch what was happening in another room--and that wasn't worth it. This Dropcam is certainly worth the reasonable, affordable price.The Dropcam was very easy to set up on my MacBook Pro laptop, and it only took a few minutes with no difficult configuring at all. Nice! Real nice! Speaking about real, the realtime picture is surprisingly clear. You can set it to zoom into 4 quadrants plus the center, that's upper left, lower left, upper right, and lower right. It sends out movement & sound event e-mail alerts. You can view the action in a big 3/4-screen view with a timeline at the bottom. And with a monthly subscription, you can go back through the timeline and take & save videoclips. Better yet, the Dropcam has a microphone/speaker so you can hear the action plus talk through the speaker. Wow, and all at an affordable price.I definitely recommend this camera if you want to EASILY (I emphasize easily) monitor something either on premise or via a website remotely. It has just about everything, including night vision, that you would want in a wireless video monitoring camera that works off your own home wireless system instead of a separate type of router device. Hope the next version has a remote-controlled pan/tilt feature.

Reviews.Title: Watching Dad After Surgery
Reviews.Author: bilo
Reviews.Content: Here is a thank you note to dropcam support that is self explanatory. The unit we purchased was used and needed to be reset. I can't speak to the longevity of the camera, but my first impression is very positive.Sonya,Thank you! We hooked up to the hospital WiFi system without issue. My family can now view and hear my father as he recovers from surgery through our mobile devices, laptops, and home computers. This was the only system we could find that did not require access to the WiFi router. Set up was very easy once the unit was reset. The picture is very good and the sound is surprising good considering how small it is.Thanks again for making the resetting our Dropcam a priority. This is a great example of small things having a huge impact.Please forward this email to your supervisor as you deserve credit for your outstanding customer service.Thank you,

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted to track the invisible cat
Reviews.Author: David Dinsmore "The Computer Guy"
Reviews.Content: We have two black cats.  One very social and the other not so much. When we travel I needed a way to check on both of them and confirm they are eating and not trapped in a closet. This camera with the motion sensor timeline is perfect. At night I check the alerts and quickly jump to points where I can see both cats lounging in the sun once everyone has left the house.Great software, easy setup, small and night vision make it the perfect home monitor.

Reviews.Title: Easiest. Set-up. Ever.
Reviews.Author: Tom M
Reviews.Content: I am not a techie person, so I was delighted by how easy my Dropcam set up.  It took all of about 10 minutes to be up and running on my MacBook, iPhone and iPad.  The image and sound quality is very good.  Now I want a couple more Dropcams. Dropcam HD Wi-Fi Wireless Video Monitoring Camera

Reviews.Title: Works great but two issues
Reviews.Author: Father of One
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  The features of viewing on APPS and on the computer are priceless when you use this as a baby monitor.  We used it when we went on vacation to check up on the dog and dog sitter.  The only issues I have is there is around a five second delay and sometimes my boy has already made it out of bed and out of his room before it notifies me of motion.  The second issue is that the camera gets really hot when it is on for an extended period of time and might cause the night vision to darken.  Other than those two things I am very pleased with my Dropcam.  I intend on purchasing another for downstairs.

Reviews.Title: money well invested
Reviews.Author: Rootbeer
Reviews.Content: This cam is much better than the baby monitors I have looked at.  Most of the baby monitors cost more than $150 and only do one thing.  As of the drop cam I plan to reuse the cam as a security camera once we stop using it as a baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: MJK
Reviews.Content: I have tested many Wifi cameras and this is the best and simplest to set up and use. I work in the Security field and needed something small and easy to set up while travelling. Dropcam is the solution. it has great video quality, night vision and the DVR function is fantastic. I am able to monitor from a tablet/smartphone easily. I wish Dropcam created a BlackBerry app for their Dropcams. Email alerts are also a great way to keep informed of what is happening on your cameras (I have 3 of them so far). Dropcam has really created a small, portable, easy to use wifi camera for lots of different applications.

Reviews.Title: Meets my Expectations
Reviews.Author: farside g larson
Reviews.Content: Purchased the cam to remotely view a working dog that spends time kenneled in my truck. Set-up was easy, straight forward, relatively quick. I used a VirginMobile Mi-Fi 3g hotspot to connect to. This set-up worked as I had hoped  and I have pretty darn good clarity. Ocassionally there are momentary drops but the cam and the hotspot independently re-establish communications without any hands on involvement by the user.  If you are looking for a little peace of mind by keeping an eye on something that you value this little cam won't break your bank and I don't think the performance will disappoint you.  The optional service is worth looking into

Reviews.Title: Keep watch on old cat
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: We have a 23 + year old cat. Oldest cat our vet has ever seen. We use DropCam as a means of checking on Tasha night and day when we are out of house .. She seems to realize that we are checking in on her.  Could be utilized to check on child . After 23 years Tasha is very important to us..  Like the product . very useful to keep eye on house.  Children leave home Tasha stays and loves us

Reviews.Title: Dropcam HD
Reviews.Author: William P. Conrad
Reviews.Content: Given the price, the Dropcam HD is a bargain. The picture quality, however, is not what you would expect from a device with HD in it's name. The Dropcam company was responsive when I questioned the quality of the picture, however, the replacement unit they sent me was not an improvement in the picture department. Everything else about the Dropcam works as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Sound
Reviews.Author: The Rod
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful device. Simple, but does a great job. The only negative is that the sound volume is quite low, so that communicating through the link is difficult.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam is dropdead best home cam.
Reviews.Author: HomeNursing
Reviews.Content: Dropcam is perfect for keeping an eye on an elderly parent.  It provides a great picture, easy to set up, easy to operate on the iPhone, you can hear your parent and talk to them.  Just an excellent product and service.

Reviews.Title: Great for office security
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: We've utilized the camera for 24x7 video security at our offices and it has been a great, much less expensive, alternative to our security/alarm company's video offerings. No infrastructure to deal with, ability to easily save recordings, and alerts if the camera goes off line for any reason. And the ability to check in via our iPhones has been wonderful. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Dropcam HD
Reviews.Author: Walter L. Watts
Reviews.Content: After 2 months of use, including the subscription DVR service, I'm finding the Dropcam HD fully lives up to its claims. Excellent security camera for both business and residential use.I would highly recommend this device for anyone looking for a reliable, high-def security camera for the home or office.

Reviews.Title: I love my Dropcam!
Reviews.Author: TurfDoc
Reviews.Content: I bought my Dropcam after considering a large number of webcams that are on the market including seeing several different brands being used by family as baby monitors.  The simplicity of Dropcam was appealing to me having heard my wife's brother-in-law complain about the tedious setup required to simply be able to view the camera over the web.  Setup was SO simple.  Plugged it into my computer, joined it to the wireless network.  That's it.  The camera's wireless radio seems to work well in my house.  Currently using it on my porch as a security camera.  The infrared feature works very well - lights up my entire porch and parts of the carport.  I opted for the 7-day DVR package and have been very pleased by the function of the service.  The sensitivity of the motion sensor seems about right.  I'm constantly amazed at how fast I receive notifications.  If I walk out on the porch my cell phone chimes with a notification within 3 seconds.  Hard to complain about that.Overall, I am VERY pleased with my purchase and plan to buy one more for our nursery to keep an eye on our son once he arrives.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup
Reviews.Author: Alan V. Tincher
Reviews.Content: This is very easy to set up. Took about 5 minutes. Do wish there was an iPad app.  Not the greatest in the dark.
